00067   SimpleHitSearch::SimpleHitSearch() 
00068     : VRawADCValueProcessor("SimpleHitSearch"),
00069       _calibration(new NoOpCalibration),
00070       _cellParameterCollection(0),
00071       _hfile(0),
00072       _detectorTransformationChange(this,&SimpleHitSearch::detectorTransformationChanged),
00073       _referenceTransformationChange(this,&SimpleHitSearch::referenceTransformationChanged),
00074       _nPedestalEvents(0),
00075       _nPedestalEventsTotal(0),
00076       _nPedestalEventSets(0),
00077       _nEventsTotal(0),
00078       _nEventsWithHits(0),
00079       _nEventsWithHitsTotal(0),
00080       _uncoveredTriggerCounter(0),
00081       _nEventsWithoutADC(0),
00082       _rejectedEvents(0),
00083       _nEventsWithMissingAdcBlocks(0)
00084 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
00085     ,_histGroupKey(type()),
00086       _histSignalKey("Signal"),
00087       _histNoiseKey("Noise"),
00088 #ifdef CORRECT_SIGNAL_INDUCED_PED_SHIFT
00089       _histSignalInducedPedestalShiftKey("SignalInducedPedestalShift"),
00090 #endif
00091       _histNoiseCorrelationKey("NoiseCorrelation"),
00092       _histTriggerEnableKey("TriggerEnabledBits")
00093       //      ,_histSignalPerLayerKey("SignalPerLayer"),
00094       //      _histNoiseKey("Noise"),
00095       //      _histPedestalKey("Pedestal"),
00096       //      _histADCKey("ADCValue")
00097 #endif
00098   {
00099     changeState(kStateSkipEvent);
00100 
00101     // --- set state methods
00102     // illegal state
00103     _stateFunc[kStateUnknown]=static_cast<SimpleHitSearch::ProcessFunc_t>(0);
00104 
00105     // do nothing
00106     _stateFunc[kStateSkipEvent]=&SimpleHitSearch::skipEvents;                            
00107 
00108     // cosmics trigger:
00109     // slowly update pedestals and search for hits
00110     _stateFunc[kStateCosmics]=&SimpleHitSearch::processCosmics;   
00111 
00112     // beam trigger:
00113     // detector is full with hits always at the same locations
00114     _stateFunc[kStateBeam]=&SimpleHitSearch::processBeamEvents;
00115 
00116     // pedestal trigger:
00117     // recalculate pedestals
00118     _stateFunc[kStatePedestals]=&SimpleHitSearch::processPedestalEvents;
00119 
00120     // initialisation
00121     // calculate pedestals for the first time (hits are 
00122     // the maximum signal in n-events (adjustable by parameter)
00123     // rejected by ignoreing
00124     _stateFunc[kStateInitialPedestals]=&SimpleHitSearch::processFirstPedestalEvents;
00125 
00126     // initialisation
00127     // calculate pedestals. Hits are rejected by using prior 
00128     // knowledge of the pedestals and the noise
00129     // the calibratin chip is on. For the time beeing treat the events
00130     _stateFunc[kStateRefinePedestals]=&SimpleHitSearch::processPedestalEventsWithHitRejection; 
00131 
00132     // calibration chip is on:
00133     // like beam events (signals at the same place in all events.)
00134     _stateFunc[kStateCalibration]=&SimpleHitSearch::processBeamEvents; 
00135 
00136     // ----- pedestal, adc, noise cuts
00137 
00138     _adcRange.clear();
00139     _adcRange.push_back(-(1<<16));
00140     _adcRange.push_back( (1<<16-1));
00141     
00142     registerProcessorParameter( "ADCRange" , 
00143                                "The allowed ADC range"  ,
00144                                _adcRange ,
00145                                _adcRange ,
00146                                _adcRange.size() ) ;
00147 
00148     _pedestalRange.clear();
00149     _pedestalRange.push_back(_adcRange[0]+30);
00150     _pedestalRange.push_back(_adcRange[1]-1000);
00151     
00152     registerProcessorParameter( "PedestalRange" , 
00153                                "The allowed pedestal range. Cells with pedestals outside this range are declared dead." ,
00154                                _pedestalRange ,
00155                                _pedestalRange ,
00156                                _pedestalRange.size() ) ;
00157 
00158     _pedestalChangeCut=FLT_MAX;
00159     registerProcessorParameter( "PedestalChangeCut" , 
00160                                "If the mean value of the last 5 values (ignoring hits) changes by more than this threshold, then it is assumed that the pedestal has changed.." ,
00161                                _pedestalChangeCut ,
00162                                _pedestalChangeCut);
00163 
00164     _maxPedestalChange=500;
00165     registerProcessorParameter( "MaxPedestalChange" , 
00166                                 "Maximum allowed pedestal change.",
00167                                _maxPedestalChange ,
00168                                _maxPedestalChange);

00173     _noiseRange.push_back(30);

00176                                "The allowed noise range. Cells outside this range are declared dead." ,
00177                                _noiseRange ,
00178                                _noiseRange ,

00182     registerProcessorParameter( "MaxHitOccupancy" ,

00188     registerProcessorParameter( "ToleratedSaturationFraction" , 
00189                                "The maximum fraction of events in which a cell was out of the allowed ADC range (beyond the cell is declared dead)." ,
00190                                _toleratedSaturationFraction ,
00191                                _toleratedSaturationFraction) ;
00192     _signalThreshold = .5;
00193     registerProcessorParameter( "SignalThreshold" , 
00194                                "Cells with a signal (after calibration) larger than this threshold are considered to have a hit. " ,

00200     registerProcessorParameter( "NoiseCut" ,

00202                                _noiseCutVec ,

00479   SimpleHitSearch::~SimpleHitSearch() {
00480     delete _calibration;
00481     delete _cellParameterCollection;
00482   }
00483 
00484   void SimpleHitSearch::init()
00485   {
00486     std::stringstream message;
00487     bool error=false;
00488     try {
00489       VRawADCValueProcessor::init();
00490     }
00491     catch (ErrorMissingConditionsDataHandler &conddata_error) {
00492       // --- catch conditions data handler registration errors
00493       //   ... and build a combined error message.
00494       std::string a(conddata_error.what());
00495       error=true;
00496       if (a.size()>0) {
00497         a.erase(a.size()-1);
00498         message << a;
00499       }
00500     }
00501 
00502     // --- register conditions data handler
00503     
00504     if (!error) {
00505       message << "SimpleHitSearch::init> no conditions data handler for the collections:";
00506     }
00507     
00508     if (!_colNameDetectorTransformation.empty()) {
00509       if (!marlin::ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener( &_detectorTransformationChange ,_colNameDetectorTransformation) ) {
00510         message << " " << _colNameDetectorTransformation;
00511         error=true;
00512       }
00513     }
00514 
00515     if (!_colNameReferenceTransformation.empty()) {
00516       if (!marlin::ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener( &_referenceTransformationChange ,_colNameReferenceTransformation) ) {
00517         message << " " << _colNameReferenceTransformation;
00518         error=true;
00519       }
00520     }
00521     
00522     if (error) { 
00523       // also throw an exception if the registration of conditions data handlers failed in VRawADCValueProcessor::init
00524       message <<  ".";
00525       throw ErrorMissingConditionsDataHandler(message.str());
00526     }
00527 
00528     _mapping.setViewConnectionTree(_viewConnectionTree!=0);
00529 
00530     _lastEvent=0;
00531 
00532     // --- initialise the analysis
00533     if (_noiseCutVec.size()<1) {
00534       _noiseCut=5;
00535     }
00536     else {
00537       _noiseCut=_noiseCutVec[0];
00538     }
00539     if (_noiseCutVec.size()>1) {
00540       _noiseCutForPedestalNoiseCalculation=_noiseCutVec[1];
00541     }
00542     else {
00543       _noiseCutForPedestalNoiseCalculation=5;
00544     }
00545 
00546     _cellParameter.clear();
00547     _pedestalNoiseIsKnown=kFALSE;
00548 
00549     _skipNEvents=_skipFirstNEvents;
00550     changeState(kStateSkipEvent);
00551 
00552     if (_skipCalibrationEventsAlways) {
00553       _stateFunc[kStateCalibration]=&SimpleHitSearch::skipCalibrationEvents;
00554     }
00555 
00556     // TODO:check parameters
00557     fullReset();
00558 
00559     printParameters();
00560 
00561     std::cout << "event energy = " << _parNameEventEnergy << std::endl;
00562 
00563     std::cout << "NoiseCut = " << _noiseCut << std::endl;
00564     std::cout << "NoiseCutForPedestalNoiseCalculation = " << _noiseCutForPedestalNoiseCalculation << std::endl;
00565     std::cout << std::endl;
00566 
00567 #ifdef CORRECT_SIGNAL_INDUCED_PED_SHIFT
00568     std::cout << "Doing the signal induced pedestal corrections." << std::endl;
00569 #endif
00570     assert(_updatePedestalsEveryNEvents > _minNEventsForPedestalNoiseUpdate);
00571 
00572     _rejectedEvents=0;
00573     _rejectBecauseOfError=0;
00574     _rejectBecauseTooManyHits=0;
00575     _rejectBecauseOfMissingADCBlocks=0;
00576 
00577     _uncoveredTriggerCounter=0;
00578     _nEventsWithoutADC=0;
00579     _nEventsWithMissingAdcBlocks=0;
00580     _nEventsTotal=0;
00581     _nEventsWithHits=0;
00582     _rejectedEvents=0;
00583     _nPedestalEvents=0;
00584     _nEventsSkipped=0;
00585 
00586     _skipDirtyEventsInPedestalCalculation=0;
00587 
00588     // build error mask
00589     _errorMask = ~CALICE::ErrorBits::getErrorBitMask(_maskedErrorNames);
00590     
00591 
00592 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
00593     // --- verify correctness of histogram parameters
00594     if (_signalHistPar.size()!=3) throw std::runtime_error("SimpleHitSearch::init> Parameter SignalBinning should contain exactly 3 values.");
00595     if (_noiseHistPar.size()!=3) throw std::runtime_error("SimpleHitSearch::init> Parameter NoiseBinning should contain exactly 3 values.");
00596     if (_adcHistPar.size()!=3) throw std::runtime_error("SimpleHitSearch::init> Parameter AdcBinning should contain exactly 3 values.");
00597 
00598     histmgr::HistMgr *histogramList=histmgr::HistMgr::getInstance();
00599     histogramList->createHistogramGroup(_histGroupKey);
00600     histogramList->lockGroup(_histGroupKey);
00601     // create dummy histogram collections otherwise the Output processor will not get informed about the 
00602     // existence of histogram groups (Better solution?)
00603     createHistograms(0);
00604 
00605 #endif
00606 
00607     // --- Calibration object
00608     delete _calibration;
00609     CalibrationFactory::getInstance()->listKits();
00610     _calibration=CalibrationFactory::getInstance()->createCalibrationObject(_calibrationObjectName, _colNameModuleDescription, _calibrationConstantColName);
00611 
00612     if (!_calibration) {
00613       std::stringstream message;
00614       message << "SimpleHitSearch::init> Failed to create calibration object \"" << _calibrationObjectName << "\".";
00615       throw std::runtime_error(message.str());
00616     }
00617 
00618   }

00621   void SimpleHitSearch::processRunHeader( LCRunHeader* run) {
00622     //name();

00624          << " in run " << run->getRunNumber()
00625          << std::endl ;
00626

00628     _runnum = run->getRunNumber();

00632     _hfile = TFile::Open(rootname.str().c_str(),"RECREATE");
00633     if (!_hfile) std::cout << "Warning, couldn't open file " <<  rootname.str() << "to save the noise histograms for MC reco." << std::endl;
00634     //noise histograms, will help filling the database for the MC reco
00635     //std::ostringstream sLabel1D[30][9][36][2];
00636     //std::ostringstream sTitle1D[30][9][36][2];
00637     for (unsigned int layer = 0; layer < 30; layer++){//loop on PCBs
00638       for (unsigned int waf = 0; waf < 9; waf++){//loop on wafers
00639         for (unsigned int cell1 = 0; cell1 < 36; cell1++){//loop on cells
00640           _isDead[layer][waf][cell1] = 3;//default=disconnected
00641           //sLabel1D[layer][waf][cell1][0]<< "p_Ped_l"<<layer<<"_waf"<<waf<<"_cell"<<cell1 ;
00642           //sTitle1D[layer][waf][cell1][0]<< "ADC counts, for cell " << cell1 << "; ADC counts " ;
00643           //p_Ped[layer][waf][cell1] = new TH1F(sLabel1D[layer][waf][cell1][0].str().c_str(),sTitle1D[layer][waf][cell1][0].str().c_str(),500,-100,20);
00644           std::stringstream label;
00645           label << "p_Ped_l"<<layer<<"_waf"<<waf<<"_cell"<<cell1 ;
00646           std::stringstream title;
00647           title << "ADC counts, for cell " << cell1 << "; ADC counts " ;
00648           p_Ped[layer][waf][cell1] = new TH1F(label.str().c_str(),title.str().c_str(),500,-100,20);

00650         }
00651       }
00652       }

00690 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
00691   void SimpleHitSearch::createHistograms(UInt_t n_modules) 
00692   {
00693     histmgr::HistMgr *histogramList=histmgr::HistMgr::getInstance();
00694  
00695     Bool_t need_to_recreate_histograms=false;
00696 
00697     if (histogramList->getNEntriesTotal(_histGroupKey)>0) {
00698       // just check for one histogram whether the number of layers have changed. If that is the case
00699       // recreate the histograms.
00700 
00701       if (histogramList->getHistogramCollection(_histGroupKey,_histKey[kH1Signal]).n() != n_modules) {
00702           need_to_recreate_histograms=true;
00703       }
00704 
00705 #ifdef CORRECT_SIGNAL_INDUCED_PED_SHIFT
00706       const histmgr::Histogram2DCollection_t an_hist_col=histogramList->getHistogram2DCollection(_histGroupKey,_histSignalInducedPedestalShiftKey);
00707       if (!an_hist_col.is2D()) {
00708         need_to_recreate_histograms=true;
00709       }
00710       else if (an_hist_col.nMajor()!=n_modules) { 
00711         need_to_recreate_histograms=true;
00712       }
00713       else {
00714         for  (UInt_t major_i=0; major_i<n_modules; major_i++) 
00715           if (an_hist_col.nMinor(major_i++)!=5) {
00716             need_to_recreate_histograms=true;
00717           }
00718       }
00719 #endif
00720 
00721 
00722 #ifdef CORRELATED_NOISE
00723       const histmgr::Histogram2DCollection_t a_hist_col=histogramList->getHistogram2DCollection(_histGroupKey,_histNoiseCorrelationKey);
00724       if (!a_hist_col.is2D()) {
00725         need_to_recreate_histograms=true;
00726       }
00727       else if (a_hist_col.nMajor()!=n_modules) { 
00728         need_to_recreate_histograms=true;
00729       }
00730       else {
00731         for  (UInt_t major_i=0; major_i<n_modules; major_i++) 
00732           if (a_hist_col.nMinor(major_i++)!=5) {
00733             need_to_recreate_histograms=true;
00734           }
00735       }
00736 #endif
00737       
00738       if (need_to_recreate_histograms) {
00739         histogramList->writeHistograms(_histGroupKey,true);
00740       }
00741     }
00742     else {
00743       need_to_recreate_histograms=true;
00744     }
00745 
00746     // (re)create the histograms 
00747     if (need_to_recreate_histograms) {
00748 
00749       // reset for debugging
00750       //      for (UInt_t i=0; i<kNH1; i++) {
00751       //        _histCol[i]=0;
00752       //      }
00753 
00754       histogramList->createHistograms(_histGroupKey, (_histKey[kH1Signal]=histmgr::Key_t("SignalPerLayer")),n_modules,
00755                                       HistPar((UInt_t) _signalHistPar[0], _signalHistPar[1], _signalHistPar[2]),true);
00756 
00757       histogramList->createHistograms(_histGroupKey,(_histKey[kH1TotalSignal]=histmgr::Key_t("TotalSignal")),1,
00758                                                           HistPar((UInt_t) _totalSignalHistPar[0], _totalSignalHistPar[1], _totalSignalHistPar[2]),true);
00759 
00760       //      _histCol[kH1Noise]=histogramList->createHistograms(_histGroupKey,histmgr::Key_t("Noise"),n_modules,
00761       //                                                         HistPar((UInt_t) _noiseHistPar[0], _noiseHistPar[1], _noiseHistPar[2]),true);
00762 
00763     histogramList->createHistograms(_histGroupKey,_histKey[kH1CalcNoise]=histmgr::Key_t("CalculatedNoise"),n_modules,
00764                                     HistPar((UInt_t) _noiseHistPar[0], _noiseHistPar[1], _noiseHistPar[2]),true);
00765 
00766 #ifdef WITH_ALL_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
00767     histogramList->createHistograms(_histGroupKey,_histKey[kH1FinalNoise]=histmgr::Key_t("FinalNoise"),n_modules,
00768                                     HistPar((UInt_t) _noiseHistPar[0], _noiseHistPar[1], _noiseHistPar[2]),true);
00769 #endif
00770 
00771 #ifdef WITH_ALL_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
00772     histogramList->createHistograms(_histGroupKey,(_histKey[kH1ADC]=histmgr::Key_t("ADCValues")),n_modules,
00773                                                      HistPar((UInt_t) _adcHistPar[0], _adcHistPar[1], _adcHistPar[2]),true);
00774 #endif
00775     
00776 #ifdef WITH_ALL_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
00777     histogramList->createHistograms(_histGroupKey,_histKey[kH1Pedestal]=histmgr::Key_t("Pedestal"),n_modules,
00778                                                           HistPar((UInt_t) _adcHistPar[0], _adcHistPar[1], _adcHistPar[2]),true);
00779 
00780     histogramList->createHistograms(_histGroupKey,_histKey[kH1FinalPedestal]=histmgr::Key_t("FinalPedestal"),n_modules,
00781                                     HistPar((UInt_t) _adcHistPar[0], _adcHistPar[1], _adcHistPar[2]),true);
00782 #endif
00783 
00784     histogramList->createHistograms(_histGroupKey,_histKey[kH1CalcPedestal]=histmgr::Key_t("CalculatedPedestal"),n_modules,
00785                                                               HistPar((UInt_t) _adcHistPar[0], _adcHistPar[1], _adcHistPar[2]),true);
00786     
00787     histogramList->createHistograms(_histGroupKey, _histKey[kH1PedestalChange]=histmgr::Key_t("PedestalChanges"), n_modules,
00788                                     HistPar((UInt_t) _pedestalChangeHistPar[0], _pedestalChangeHistPar[1], _pedestalChangeHistPar[2]),true);
00789 
00790     histogramList->createHistograms(_histGroupKey,_histKey[kH1PedestalCorrection]=histmgr::Key_t("PedestalCorrection"),n_modules,
00791                                     HistPar((UInt_t) _pedestalChangeHistPar[0], _pedestalChangeHistPar[1], _pedestalChangeHistPar[2]),true);
00792 
00793     histogramList->createHistograms(_histGroupKey, _histKey[kH1NoiseChange]=histmgr::Key_t("NoiseChanges"), n_modules,
00794                                     HistPar((UInt_t) _noiseHistPar[0], _noiseHistPar[1], _noiseHistPar[2]),true);
00795     
00796 #ifdef WITH_ALL_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
00797     histogramList->createHistograms(_histGroupKey, _histKey[kH1NoiseAverage]=histmgr::Key_t("AverageNoise"), n_modules,
00798                                     HistPar((UInt_t) _noiseHistPar[0], _noiseHistPar[1], _noiseHistPar[2]),true);
00799 
00800     histogramList->createHistograms(_histGroupKey,_histKey[kH1SignalAverage]=histmgr::Key_t("AverageSignal"),n_modules,
00801                                     HistPar((UInt_t) _pedestalChangeHistPar[0], _pedestalChangeHistPar[1], _pedestalChangeHistPar[2]),true);
00802 #endif
00803 
00804     histogramList->createHistograms(_histGroupKey,_histKey[kH1DeadCells]=histmgr::Key_t("DeadCells"),n_modules,
00805                                                            HistPar(50,-.5,50-.5),true);
00806 
00807     histogramList->createHistograms(_histGroupKey, (_histKey[kH1NHits]=histmgr::Key_t("NHits")), n_modules,
00808                                     HistPar(80,-.5,80-.5),true);
00809     
00810     histogramList->createHistograms(_histGroupKey,_histKey[kH1States]=histmgr::Key_t("States"),2,
00811                                                         HistPar(kNStates+1,-.5,kNStates+.5),true);
00812 
00813     histogramList->createHistograms(_histGroupKey,_histKey[kH1Errors]=histmgr::Key_t("Errors"),1,
00814                                                         HistPar(33,-.5,32.5),true);
00815 
00816     histogramList->createHistograms(_histGroupKey,_histKey[kH1NoGlobalPedCorr]=histmgr::Key_t("ADCValueBeforeGlobalPedCorrection") ,216,
00817                             HistPar(650,-250,400),true);
00818 
00819     histogramList->createHistograms(_histGroupKey,_histKey[kH1NoPedSh]=histmgr::Key_t("ADCValueAfterGlobalPedCorrection") ,216,
00820                             HistPar(650,-250,400),true);
00821 
00822     histogramList->createHistograms(_histGroupKey,_histKey[kH1PedSh]=histmgr::Key_t("ADCValueAfterPedShCorr") ,216,
00823                             HistPar(650,-250,400),true);
00824 
00825 
00826     // verify code sanity: Are all the histograms created?
00827     assert(kNH1==23);
00828     
00829     lcio::IntVec index;
00830     lcio::IntVec chip_index;
00831 #ifdef CORRECT_SIGNAL_INDUCED_PED_SHIFT
00832     lcio::IntVec wafer_index;
00833     lcio::IntVec pixel_index;
00834 #endif      
00835     for (UInt_t module_i=0; module_i<n_modules; module_i++) {
00836       index.push_back(5);
00837       chip_index.push_back(12);
00838 #ifdef CORRECT_SIGNAL_INDUCED_PED_SHIFT
00839       wafer_index.push_back(6);
00840       pixel_index.push_back(216);
00841 #endif      
00842     }
00843 
00844 #ifdef CORRECT_SIGNAL_INDUCED_PED_SHIFT
00845 
00846     histogramList->create2DHistograms(_histGroupKey,_histSignalInducedPedestalShiftKey,chip_index,
00847                                       HistPar(30,100,30000),
00848                                       HistPar(150,-149.5,149.5),true);
00849 
00850 #endif
00851 
00852 
00853 #ifdef CORRELATED_NOISE
00854     histogramList->create2DHistograms(_histGroupKey,_histNoiseCorrelationKey,chip_index,
00855                                       HistPar((UInt_t) _noiseHistPar[0], _noiseHistPar[1], _noiseHistPar[2]),
00856                                       HistPar((UInt_t) _noiseHistPar[0], _noiseHistPar[1], _noiseHistPar[2]),true);
00857 #endif
00858 
00859     if (_mapping.getNModules()>0) {
00860       lcio::IntVec cell_arr;
00861       lcio::StringVec noise_name;
00862       lcio::StringVec signal_name;
00863       if (_mapping.isModuleConditionsDataComplete()) {
00864 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
00865         std::cout << "SimpleHitSearch Number of defined Modules: "  << _mapping.getNModules() << std::endl;
00866 #endif
00867         for (UInt_t module_i=0; module_i<_mapping.getNModules(); module_i++) {
00868 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
00869           std::cout << "Cells in module " << module_i << ": " << _mapping.getNCellsPerModule(module_i) << std::endl;    
00870 #endif  
00871           cell_arr.push_back(_mapping.getNCellsPerModule(module_i));
00872           std::stringstream a_name_ext;
00873 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
00874           std::cout << "Module Number: " << module_i << std::endl; 
00875           std::cout << "Module Name: " << _mapping.getModuleName(module_i) << std::endl;
00876           std::cout << "Cell Index: " << std::hex << _mapping.getGeometricalCellIndex(module_i,0) << std::dec << std::endl;
00877 #endif
00878           CellIndex cell_index(_mapping.getGeometricalCellIndex(module_i,0));
00879 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
00880           std::cout << "Layer Index: " << cell_index.getLayerIndex() << std::endl;
00881           a_name_ext << "_" << _mapping.getModuleName(module_i) << "_layer_" << cell_index.getLayerIndex();
00882 #endif
00883 
00884 
00885           
00886           noise_name.push_back(std::string("Noise")+a_name_ext.str());
00887           signal_name.push_back(std::string("Signal")+a_name_ext.str());
00888           
00889         }
00890       }
00891       histogramList->createHistograms(_histGroupKey,_histSignalKey,cell_arr,
00892                                       HistPar((UInt_t) _signalHistPar[0], _signalHistPar[1], _signalHistPar[2]),true);
00893       histogramList->createHistograms(_histGroupKey,_histNoiseKey,noise_name, cell_arr,
00894                                       HistPar((UInt_t) _noiseHistPar[0], _noiseHistPar[1], _noiseHistPar[2]),true);
00895     }
00896     
00897     // verify code sanity: Are all the histograms created?
00898     assert(kNH1Col2D==3);
00899 
00900     histogramList->createHistograms(_histGroupKey,_histTriggerEnableKey,1,HistPar(33,-1-.5,32-.5),true);
00901     }
00902   }

00906 
00907   void SimpleHitSearch::fillErrorHistogram(unsigned int error_bits) {
00908     histmgr::HistMgr *histogramList=histmgr::HistMgr::getInstance();
00909     histmgr::HistogramCollection_t & error_hist_arr=histogramList->getHistogramCollection(_histGroupKey,_histKey[kH1Errors]);
00910     histmgr::FloatHistogram1D *error_hist=error_hist_arr.histogram(0);
00911     unsigned int mask=1;
00912     for (UInt_t bit_i=0; bit_i<32; bit_i++) {
00913       if (error_bits & mask) {
00914         error_hist->fill(bit_i);
00915       }
00916       mask<<=1;
00917     }
00918   }
00919 
00920 #endif
00921 
00922 
00923   void SimpleHitSearch::skipEvents(LCEvent *evtP) {
00924     if (_skipNEvents--==0) {
00925       if (!_pedestalNoiseIsKnown && (!_triggerConf.isPurePedestalTrigger())) {
00926         // skip events until the first pedestal trigger arrives
00927         _skipNEvents++;
00928       }
00929       else if (stateTransition()) {
00930         callStateFunc(evtP);
00931         return; 
00932       }
00933     }
00934     _nEventsSkipped++;
00935   }
00936 
00937   void SimpleHitSearch::skipCalibrationEvents(LCEvent *evtP) {
00938     if (!_triggerConf.isPureCalibTrigger()) {
00939       if (stateTransition()) {
00940         callStateFunc(evtP);
00941         return; 
00942       }
00943     }
00944     _nEventsSkipped++;
00945   }
00946 
00947 
00948   void SimpleHitSearch::processCosmics(LCEvent *evtP) {
00949     if (!_triggerConf.isPureCosmicsTrigger()) {
00950       if (stateTransition()) {
00951         callStateFunc(evtP);
00952         return;
00953       }
00954     }
00955     if (!_pedestalNoiseIsKnown) {
00956       throw std::runtime_error("SimpleHitSearch::processCosmics> Pedestal and noise is not yet known. Not ready to process cosmics events.");
00957     }
00958     searchHitsAndAdjustPedestalsAndNoise(evtP);
00959   }
00960 
00961   void SimpleHitSearch::processBeamEvents(LCEvent *evtP) {
00962     if (!_triggerConf.isBeamTrigger()) {
00963       if (stateTransition()) {
00964         callStateFunc(evtP);
00965         return;
00966       }
00967     }
00968     if (!_pedestalNoiseIsKnown) {
00969       throw std::runtime_error("SimpleHitSearch::processbeamEvents> Pedestal and noise is not yet known. Not ready to process beam events.");
00970     }
00971     if (_triggerEvent.isPurePedestalTrigger()) {
00972       accumulateEventsForPedestalNoiseCalculationWithHitRejection(evtP);
00973     }
00974     else {
00975       searchHits(evtP);
00976     }
00977   }
00978 
00979   void SimpleHitSearch::processPedestalEvents(LCEvent *evtP) {
00980     // --- Pedestal noise calculation with hit rejection
00981     //if ( _nPedestalEvents==0) {
00982     // resetForPedestalNoiseReCalculation();
00983     //}
00984 
00985     if ( _nPedestalEvents > static_cast<UInt_t>(_updatePedestalsEveryNEvents) ) {
00986       calculatePedestalNoiseAndDeclareCellsDead();
00987       resetForPedestalNoiseReCalculation();
00988       _nPedestalEventSets++;
00989     }
00990 
00991     CALICE::ErrorBits error(evtP->getParameters().getIntVal(PAR_ERROR_BITS));
00992     if (!error.dirtyEvent() && (_triggerEvent.isPurePedestalTrigger() || _triggerEvent.isPureCosmicsTrigger())) {
00993       accumulateEventsForPedestalNoiseCalculationWithHitRejection(evtP);
00994     }
00995     else {
00996       error.setDirtyEvent();
00997       evtP->parameters().setValue(PAR_ERROR_BITS,error.getBits());
00998       _skipDirtyEventsInPedestalCalculation++;
00999     }
01000   }
01001 
01002   void SimpleHitSearch::processFirstPedestalEvents(LCEvent *evtP) {
01003     if (_nPedestalEvents>(UInt_t) _minNEventsForPedestalNoiseUpdate) {
01004       if (stateTransition()) {
01005         callStateFunc(evtP);
01006         return;
01007       }
01008     }
01009 
01010     // --- Initial pedestal noise calculation
01011     //if ( _nPedestalEvents==0) {
01012     //  resetForInitialPedestalNoiseCalculation();
01013     //}
01014     CALICE::ErrorBits error(evtP->getParameters().getIntVal(PAR_ERROR_BITS));
01015     error.print(std::cout);
01016     if (!error.dirtyEvent() && (_triggerEvent.isPurePedestalTrigger() || _triggerEvent.isCosmicsTrigger())) {
01017       accumulateEventsForInitialPedestalNoiseCalculation(evtP);
01018     }
01019     else {
01020       error.setDirtyEvent();
01021       evtP->parameters().setValue(PAR_ERROR_BITS,error.getBits());
01022       _skipDirtyEventsInPedestalCalculation++;
01023     }
01024 
01025   }
01026 
01027   void SimpleHitSearch::processPedestalEventsWithHitRejection(LCEvent *evtP) {
01028     if (_nPedestalEvents>(UInt_t) _minNEventsForPedestalNoiseUpdate) {
01029       if (stateTransition()) {
01030         callStateFunc(evtP);
01031         return;
01032       }
01033     }
01034 
01035     // --- Initial pedestal noise calculation
01036     //if ( _nPedestalEvents==0) {
01037     //  resetForPedestalNoiseReCalculation();
01038     //}
01039     CALICE::ErrorBits error(evtP->getParameters().getIntVal(PAR_ERROR_BITS));
01040     if (!error.dirtyEvent() && (_triggerEvent.isPurePedestalTrigger() || _triggerEvent.isPureCosmicsTrigger())) {
01041       accumulateEventsForPedestalNoiseCalculationWithHitRejection(evtP);
01042     }
01043     else {
01044       error.setDirtyEvent();
01045       evtP->parameters().setValue(PAR_ERROR_BITS,error.getBits());
01046       _skipDirtyEventsInPedestalCalculation++;
01047     }
01048   }
01049 
01050   const char *__state_names[]={"Unknown","skip","cosmics","beam","pedestal","initial pedestal","pedestal refinement","calibration"};
01051 
01052   bool SimpleHitSearch::stateTransition()
01053   {
01054     EState was_state = _isState;
01055     if (_skipNEvents<=0 || _isState != kStateSkipEvent) {
01056       // If the pedestals and the noise is not well known (states: kStateInitialPedestals, kStateRefinePedestals) 
01057       // it should always be calculated if the accumalted number of events is considered to be sufficient.
01058       if (was_state == kStateInitialPedestals || was_state == kStateRefinePedestals) {
01059         if (_nPedestalEvents>(UInt_t) _minNEventsForPedestalNoiseUpdate) {
01060           UInt_t from_n_pedestal_events=_nPedestalEvents;  
01061           calculatePedestalNoiseAndDeclareCellsDead();
01062 
01063 #ifndef RECO_DEBUG
01064           std::cout << " --- " << name() << " Notification :" << std::endl
01065                     <<  (was_state == kStateInitialPedestals ?
01066                          "  -  Initial pedestal and noise calculation from "
01067                          :"  -  Pedestal and noise refinement from ")
01068                     << from_n_pedestal_events << " events:" << std::endl;
01069           showNoiseStat();
01070           std::cout <<std::endl;
01071 #endif    
01072           _nPedestalEventSets++;
01073         }
01074       }
01075     
01076       // TODO: keep "initial pedestal noise calculation" state if pedestal noise is not known?
01077       // Probably not.
01078       //    if (!_pedestalNoiseIsKnown && _isState==kStateInitialPedestal) {
01079       //      return;
01080       //    }
01081 
01082       if ( _triggerConf.isPureCalibTrigger() ) {
01083         // If the calibration chip is on but the pedestals are not known yet
01084         // we can only skip the events until the calibration chip goes off again.
01085         if (!_pedestalNoiseIsKnown) {
01086           changeState(kStateSkipEvent);
01087         }
01088         else {
01089           changeState(kStateCalibration);
01090         }
01091       }
01092       else if (_triggerConf.isBeamTrigger()) {
01093           changeState(kStateBeam);
01094       }
01095       else if (_triggerConf.isPureCosmicsTrigger()) {
01096 
01097         // if the pedestals and the noise are not yet known
01098         // it has to be calculated first. 
01099         //
01100         // This is done in two phases:
01101         //
01102         //  1) Assume all signals are noise but remove the maximum signal in x-events
01103         //  2) Use the knowledge of the pedestals and the noise to reject signals
01104         
01105         if (_pedestalNoiseIsKnown) {
01106           if (_isState==kStateInitialPedestals) {
01107             // phase 2 of pedestals and noise estimation
01108             changeState(kStateRefinePedestals);
01109             resetForPedestalNoiseReCalculation();
01110           }
01111           else {
01112             // if pedestals and noise are calculated
01113             // then search for cosmics
01114             changeState(kStateCosmics);
01115           }
01116         }
01117         else {
01118           // phase 1 of pedestals and noise estimation
01119           changeState(kStateInitialPedestals);
01120           resetForInitialPedestalNoiseCalculation();
01121         }
01122 
01123       }
01124       else if (_triggerConf.isPurePedestalTrigger()) {
01125         
01126         // calculate pedestals 
01127         // but cut out signal events. The latter requires knowldedge of the
01128         // pedestals and the noise which is gained in phase 1.
01129         // Then go over to phase 2
01130         // (also see above.)
01131 
01132         if (_pedestalNoiseIsKnown) {
01133 
01134           // phase 2)
01135           if (was_state != kStatePedestals){
01136             resetForPedestalNoiseReCalculation();
01137           }
01138           changeState(kStatePedestals);
01139         }
01140         else {
01141 
01142           // phase 1)
01143           changeState(kStateInitialPedestals);
01144           resetForInitialPedestalNoiseCalculation();
01145         }
01146       }
01147       else {
01148         changeState(kStateSkipEvent);
01149       }
01150     }
01151 
01152     if (was_state != _isState ) {
01153       // if the new state does not accumulation pedestal data and does not just skip events
01154       // then re calculate the pedestals and the noise if enough pedestal data was accumulated.
01155       if ( _isState != kStatePedestals && _isState != kStateSkipEvent ) {
01156         if (_nPedestalEvents>(UInt_t) _minNEventsForPedestalNoiseUpdate) {
01157           UInt_t from_n_pedestal_events=_nPedestalEvents;
01158           calculatePedestalNoiseAndDeclareCellsDead();
01159           
01160           if (_nPedestalEventSets<=3) {
01161 #ifndef RECO_DEBUG
01162             std::cout << " --- " << name() << " Notification :" << std::endl
01163                       <<  "  -  Pedestal and noise from " << from_n_pedestal_events << " events (set=" << _nPedestalEventSets << "):" << std::endl;
01164                       showNoiseStat();
01165             std::cout <<std::endl;
01166 #endif
01167           }
01168 
01169           _nPedestalEventSets++;
01170         }
01171       }
01172     }
01173 
01174 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
01175 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
01176     assert( kNStates>0 );
01177 #endif
01178     histmgr::HistMgr *histogramList=histmgr::HistMgr::getInstance();
01179     histmgr::HistogramCollection_t & state_hist_arr=histogramList->getHistogramCollection(_histGroupKey,_histKey[kH1States]);
01180     state_hist_arr.histogram(0)->fill(_isState);
01181 #endif
01182 
01183     return _isState!=was_state;
01184   }
01185 
01186   void SimpleHitSearch::processEvent( LCEvent * evtP ) {
01187 
01188     TriggerBits old_trigger_conf=_triggerConf;
01189     _triggerConf = evtP->getParameters().getIntVal(_parNameTriggerConf);
01190 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
01191     std::cout << "SimpleHitSearch::ProcessEvent " << _triggerConf.getTriggerBits() << std::endl;
01192 #endif
01193 
01194     _triggerEvent = evtP->getParameters().getIntVal(_parNameTriggerEvent);
01195     
01196     if (_isState != kStateSkipEvent) {
01197       // the last trigger is initialised with kUnknown which is a save state to be in 
01198       // at some point a transition from kUnknown to something more useful must occur.
01199       if( _triggerConf != old_trigger_conf ) {
01200         
01201 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
01202         std::cout << "SimpleHitSearch::processEvent - Trigger Conf Change Occured" << std::endl;
01203         std::cout << "Configured TriggerBits: "<< _triggerConf.getTriggerBits() << std::endl;
01204         std::cout << "Old TriggerBits: "<< old_trigger_conf.getTriggerBits() << std::endl;
01205 #endif
01206         
01207         if (_skipNEvents < _skipNEventsAfterConfChanges) {
01208           _skipNEvents = _skipNEventsAfterConfChanges;
01209           changeState(SimpleHitSearch::kStateSkipEvent);
01210         }
01211         else {
01212           stateTransition();
01213         }
01214         
01215       }
01216       
01217       // for debugging:
01218       _lastEvent=evtP->getEventNumber();
01219       
01220       // skip n events after slow readout and configuration changes
01221       UInt_t events_since_last_slow_conf_record=static_cast<UInt_t>(evtP->getParameters().getIntVal(PAR_EVENTS_SINCE_LAST_DAQ_STATE_CHANGE));
01222       if (events_since_last_slow_conf_record < static_cast<UInt_t>(_skipNEventsAfterSlowConfRecords)) {
01223         changeState(kStateSkipEvent);
01224         _skipNEvents=_skipNEventsAfterSlowConfRecords-events_since_last_slow_conf_record;
01225         std::cout << events_since_last_slow_conf_record << " events since last slow readout or configuration record" << std::endl;
01226       }
01227 
01228     }
01229 
01230     callStateFunc(evtP);
01231 
01232 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
01233 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
01234     assert( kNStates>0 );
01235 #endif
01236     histmgr::HistMgr *histogramList=histmgr::HistMgr::getInstance();
01237     histmgr::HistogramCollection_t & state_hist_arr=histogramList->getHistogramCollection(_histGroupKey,_histKey[kH1States]);
01238     state_hist_arr.histogram(1)->fill(_isState);
01239 #endif
01240 
01241     // add the pedestals and noise to the event but keep ownership
01242     if (_cellParameterCollection) {
01243       evtP->addCollection(_cellParameterCollection, _cellParameterCollectionName);
01244       evtP->takeCollection( _cellParameterCollectionName );
01245     }
01246 
01247 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
01248     CALICE::ErrorBits error(evtP->getParameters().getIntVal(PAR_ERROR_BITS));
01249     fillErrorHistogram(error.getBits());
01250 #endif
01251     
01252     evtP->parameters().setValue(_parNameRecoState,static_cast<int>(_isState));
01253   }
01254 
01255   void SimpleHitSearch::fullReset()
01256   {
01257     // DEBUG std::cout << "*** SimpleHitSearch::fullReset ***" << _lastEvent<<std::endl;
01258     _nPedestalEventSets=0;
01259     _nEventsTotal=0;
01260     _nEventsWithHitsTotal=0;
01261 
01262     resetHitCounter();
01263     resetSaturationCounter();
01264     resetForInitialPedestalNoiseCalculation();
01265   }
01266   
01267   void SimpleHitSearch::resetForInitialPedestalNoiseCalculation()
01268   {
01269     // DEBUG std::cout << "*** SimpleHitSearch::resetForInitialPedestalNoiseCalculation ***" << _lastEvent<<std::endl;
01270     _nPedestalEventsTotal+=_nPedestalEvents;
01271     _nPedestalEvents=0;
01272     _eventCounterForMaximumRejection=_removeMaximumInNEvents;
01273 
01274     for(UInt_t module_i=0; module_i<_cellParameter.size(); module_i++) {
01275       for(UInt_t cell_i=0; cell_i<_cellParameter[module_i].size(); cell_i++) {
01276         _cellParameter[module_i][cell_i].resetAll();
01277         _cellParameter[module_i][cell_i].setMaxValue(INT_MIN);
01278         _cellParameter[module_i][cell_i].initADCMemory();//TODO 
01279 
01280         _cellParameter[module_i][cell_i].setDead(_mapping.isCellDead(module_i,cell_i) 
01281                                                  || !_calibration->isValid(_mapping.getModuleID(module_i),_mapping.getModuleType(module_i),cell_i));
01282       }
01283     }
01284   }
01285   
01286   void SimpleHitSearch::resetForPedestalNoiseReCalculation()
01287   {
01288     //DEBUG std::cout << "*** SimpleHitSearch::resetForPedestalNoiseReCalculation ***" << _lastEvent<<std::endl;
01289     _nPedestalEventsTotal+=_nPedestalEvents;
01290     _nPedestalEvents=0;
01291     for(UInt_t module_i=0; module_i<_cellParameter.size(); module_i++) {
01292       for(UInt_t cell_i=0; cell_i<_cellParameter[module_i].size(); cell_i++) {
01293         _cellParameter[module_i][cell_i].resetSums();
01294         _cellParameter[module_i][cell_i].initADCMemory();//TODO 
01295 
01296         _cellParameter[module_i][cell_i].setDead(_mapping.isCellDead(module_i,cell_i) 
01297                                                  || !_calibration->isValid(_mapping.getModuleID(module_i),_mapping.getModuleType(module_i),cell_i));
01298       }
01299     }
01300   }
01301   
01302   void SimpleHitSearch::resetHitCounter()
01303   {
01304     for(UInt_t module_i=0; module_i<_cellParameter.size(); module_i++) {
01305       for(UInt_t cell_i=0; cell_i<_cellParameter[module_i].size(); cell_i++) {
01306         _cellParameter[module_i][cell_i].resetHitCounter();
01307       }
01308     }
01309     _nEventsWithHitsTotal+=_nEventsWithHits;
01310     _nEventsWithHits=0;
01311   }
01312   
01313   void SimpleHitSearch::resetSaturationCounter()
01314   {
01315     for(UInt_t module_i=0; module_i<_cellParameter.size(); module_i++) {
01316       for(UInt_t cell_i=0; cell_i<_cellParameter[module_i].size(); cell_i++) {
01317         _cellParameter[module_i][cell_i].resetSaturationCounter();
01318       }
01319     }
01320 
01321     _nEventsTotal+=_nEvents;
01322     _nEvents=0;
01323 
01324   }
01325 
01326   void SimpleHitSearch::accumulateEventsForInitialPedestalNoiseCalculation(LCEvent *evtP)
01327   {
01328 
01329     try {
01330       LCCollection* col_adc = evtP->getCollection( _adcColName ) ;
01331     
01332       if (_cellParameter.size()==0) {
01333         buildCellParameters();
01334       }
01335       
01336       if (col_adc && col_adc->getNumberOfElements()>0) {
01337 
01338         CALICE::ErrorBits error(evtP->getParameters().getIntVal(PAR_ERROR_BITS));
01339         UInt_t n_cells_found=0;
01340 
01341         --_eventCounterForMaximumRejection;
01342 
01343         AdcValueAccess adc_access(col_adc,&_mapping, _calibration, &_cellParameter);
01344         if (adc_access.hasConnectedBlocks()) {
01345         do {
01346           do {
01347             CellParameter &cell_parameter=adc_access.getParameter();
01348             if (!cell_parameter.isDead()) {
01349             
01350               Int_t raw_adc_value=adc_access.getAdcValue();
01351               if(raw_adc_value>=_adcRange[0] && raw_adc_value<=_adcRange[1]) {
01352               
01353                 cell_parameter.add(raw_adc_value);
01354                 if (raw_adc_value>cell_parameter.getMaxValue()) {
01355                   cell_parameter.setMaxValue(raw_adc_value);
01356                 }
01357 
01358                 if (_eventCounterForMaximumRejection==0) {
01359                   cell_parameter.sub(cell_parameter.getMaxValue());
01360                   _eventCounterForMaximumRejection=_removeMaximumInNEvents;
01361                 }
01362 
01363               }
01364               else {
01365                 cell_parameter.incrementSaturationCounter();
01366               }
01367             }  
01368 
01369             n_cells_found++;
01370 
01371           } while (adc_access.nextValue());
01372         } while (adc_access.nextBlock());
01373         }
01374 
01375         if (n_cells_found != _mapping.getNConnectedCells()) {
01376           error.setMissingADCBlock();
01377           evtP->parameters().setValue(PAR_ERROR_BITS,error.getBits());
01378           _nEventsWithMissingAdcBlocks++;
01379         }
01380 
01381         if (_eventCounterForMaximumRejection==0) {
01382           _eventCounterForMaximumRejection=_removeMaximumInNEvents;
01383         }
01384         _nPedestalEvents++;
01385         _nEvents++;
01386 
01387       }
01388     }
01389     catch (  DataNotAvailableException &err ) {
01390       _nEventsWithoutADC++;
01391     }
01392   }
01393 
01394   void SimpleHitSearch::accumulateEventsForPedestalNoiseCalculationWithHitRejection(LCEvent *evtP)
01395   {
01396     try {
01397       LCCollection* col_adc = evtP->getCollection( _adcColName ) ;
01398     
01399       if (_cellParameter.size()==0) {
01400         buildCellParameters();
01401       }
01402       
01403       if (col_adc && col_adc->getNumberOfElements()>0) {
01404 
01405         std::vector< AverageSimple_t > pedestal_change_per_module; 
01406         pedestal_change_per_module.resize(_mapping.getNModules());
01407 
01408         CALICE::ErrorBits error(evtP->getParameters().getIntVal(PAR_ERROR_BITS));
01409         UInt_t n_cells_found=0;
01410 
01411         AdcValueAccess adc_access(col_adc,&_mapping, _calibration, &_cellParameter);
01412         if (adc_access.hasConnectedBlocks()) {
01413         do {
01414           do {
01415             CellParameter &cell_parameter=adc_access.getParameter();
01416             if (!cell_parameter.isDead()) {
01417             
01418               Int_t raw_adc_value=adc_access.getAdcValue();
01419               if(raw_adc_value>=_adcRange[0] && raw_adc_value<=_adcRange[1]) {
01420                 
01421                 Float_t adc_value=raw_adc_value-cell_parameter.getPedestal();
01422                 Float_t noise=cell_parameter.getNoise();
01423 
01424                 if (adc_value<_noiseCutForPedestalNoiseCalculation*noise) {
01425                   cell_parameter.add(raw_adc_value);
01426 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
01427                   assert ( static_cast<unsigned int>(adc_access.getModuleIndex()) < pedestal_change_per_module.size());
01428 #endif
01429                   pedestal_change_per_module[adc_access.getModuleIndex()].add(raw_adc_value-cell_parameter.getPedestal());
01430                 }
01431               }
01432               else {
01433                 cell_parameter.incrementSaturationCounter();
01434               }
01435             }  
01436 
01437             n_cells_found++;
01438 
01439           } while (adc_access.nextValue());
01440         } while (adc_access.nextBlock());
01441         }
01442 
01443         if (n_cells_found != _mapping.getNConnectedCells()) {
01444           error.setMissingADCBlock();
01445           evtP->parameters().setValue(PAR_ERROR_BITS,error.getBits());
01446           _nEventsWithMissingAdcBlocks++;
01447         }
01448 
01449         // shift pedestals by average value measured on the PCB
01450         if (_shiftPedestalFactor> 0) {
01451           UInt_t module_i=0;
01452           for (std::vector<AverageSimple_t>::iterator module_iter=pedestal_change_per_module.begin();
01453                module_iter!=pedestal_change_per_module.end();
01454                module_iter++, module_i++) {
01455             
01456             module_iter->calculate();
01457             for (std::vector<CellParameter>::iterator cell_iter=_cellParameter[module_i].begin();
01458                  cell_iter!=_cellParameter[module_i].end();
01459                  cell_iter++) {
01460               cell_iter->setPedestal(cell_iter->getPedestal()+_shiftPedestalFactor * module_iter->mean());
01461             }
01462                  
01463           }
01464         }
01465         _nPedestalEvents++;
01466         _nEvents++;
01467       }
01468     }
01469     catch (  DataNotAvailableException &err ) {
01470       _nEventsWithoutADC++;
01471     }
01472   }
01473 
01474   void SimpleHitSearch::accumulateEventsForPedestalNoiseCalculationWithHitRejectionAndPedestalShiftDetection(LCEvent *evtP)
01475   {
01476     try {
01477       LCCollection* col_adc = evtP->getCollection( _adcColName ) ;
01478     
01479       if (_cellParameter.size()==0) {
01480         buildCellParameters();
01481       }
01482       
01483       if (col_adc && col_adc->getNumberOfElements()>0) {
01484 
01485         CALICE::ErrorBits error(evtP->getParameters().getIntVal(PAR_ERROR_BITS));
01486         UInt_t n_cells_found=0;
01487 
01488         AdcValueAccess adc_access(col_adc,&_mapping, _calibration, &_cellParameter);
01489         if (adc_access.hasConnectedBlocks()) {
01490         do {
01491           do {
01492             CellParameter &cell_parameter=adc_access.getParameter();
01493             if (!cell_parameter.isDead()) {
01494             
01495               Int_t raw_adc_value=adc_access.getAdcValue();
01496               if(raw_adc_value>=_adcRange[0] && raw_adc_value<=_adcRange[1]) {
01497                 
01498                 Float_t adc_value=raw_adc_value-cell_parameter.getPedestal();
01499                 Float_t noise=cell_parameter.getNoise();
01500 
01501                 Float_t pedestal_change=cell_parameter.getMeanADCValue(adc_value);
01502 
01503                 if (fabs(pedestal_change)>noise*_pedestalChangeCut) {
01504                   cell_parameter.shiftPedestal(pedestal_change);
01505                   Float_t pedestal=cell_parameter.getPedestal();
01506                   adc_value=raw_adc_value-pedestal;
01507                 }
01508 
01509                 if (adc_value<_noiseCutForPedestalNoiseCalculation*noise) {
01510                   cell_parameter.add(raw_adc_value);
01511                 }
01512               }
01513               else {
01514                 cell_parameter.incrementSaturationCounter();
01515               }
01516             }
01517 
01518             n_cells_found++;
01519 
01520           } while (adc_access.nextValue());
01521         } while (adc_access.nextBlock());
01522         }
01523 
01524         if (n_cells_found != _mapping.getNConnectedCells()) {
01525           error.setMissingADCBlock();
01526           evtP->parameters().setValue(PAR_ERROR_BITS,error.getBits());
01527           _nEventsWithMissingAdcBlocks++;
01528         }
01529 
01530         _nPedestalEvents++;
01531         _nEvents++;
01532 
01533       }
01534     }
01535     catch (  DataNotAvailableException &err ) {
01536       _nEventsWithoutADC++;
01537     }
01538   }
01539 
01540   void SimpleHitSearch::calculatePedestalNoiseAndDeclareCellsDead()
01541   {
01542     //DEBUG std::cout << "*** SimpleHitSearch:: calculatePedestalNoiseAndDeclareCellsDead ***" << _lastEvent<<std::endl;
01543     UInt_t tolerated_saturation=(UInt_t) (_nEvents*_toleratedSaturationFraction);
01544     if (tolerated_saturation<1) tolerated_saturation=1;
01545 
01546     if (_avNoisePerModule.size() != _cellParameter.size()) {
01547       _avNoisePerModule.resize(_cellParameter.size());
01548     }
01549 
01550 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
01551     histmgr::HistMgr *histogramList=histmgr::HistMgr::getInstance();
01552     histmgr::HistogramCollection_t & pedestal_hist_arr=histogramList->getHistogramCollection(_histGroupKey,_histKey[kH1CalcPedestal]);
01553     histmgr::HistogramCollection_t & noise_hist_arr=histogramList->getHistogramCollection(_histGroupKey,_histKey[kH1CalcNoise]);
01554 
01555     histmgr::HistogramCollection_t & pedestal_change_hist_arr=histogramList->getHistogramCollection(_histGroupKey,_histKey[kH1PedestalChange]);
01556     histmgr::HistogramCollection_t & noise_change_hist_arr=histogramList->getHistogramCollection(_histGroupKey,_histKey[kH1NoiseChange]);
01557 #endif
01558 
01559     for(UInt_t module_i=0; module_i<_cellParameter.size(); module_i++) {
01560 
01561 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
01562       UInt_t n_dead=0;
01563 #endif
01564       AverageSimple_t av_noise;
01565       
01566       for(UInt_t cell_i=0; cell_i<_cellParameter[module_i].size(); cell_i++) {
01567         CellParameter &cell_parameter=_cellParameter[module_i][cell_i];
01568         if (!cell_parameter.isDead()) {
01569 
01570           av_noise.add(cell_parameter.getNoise());
01571           Float_t old_pedestal=cell_parameter.getPedestal();
01572 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
01573           Float_t old_noise=cell_parameter.getNoise();
01574 #endif
01575 
01576           cell_parameter.calculate();
01577 
01578 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
01579           pedestal_hist_arr.histogram(module_i)->fill(cell_parameter.getPedestal());
01580           noise_hist_arr.histogram(module_i)->fill(cell_parameter.getNoise());
01581 #endif
01582 
01583           if (   cell_parameter.getSaturationCounter()>tolerated_saturation
01584               || cell_parameter.getNoise()<_noiseRange[0] || cell_parameter.getNoise()>_noiseRange[1]
01585               || cell_parameter.getPedestal()<_pedestalRange[0] || cell_parameter.getPedestal()>_pedestalRange[1]
01586               || (_pedestalNoiseIsKnown && (cell_parameter.getPedestal()-old_pedestal) > _maxPedestalChange )) {
01587             cell_parameter.setDead();
01588 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
01589             n_dead++;
01590 #endif
01591           }
01592           else {
01593 
01594 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
01595             if (_pedestalNoiseIsKnown) {
01596               pedestal_change_hist_arr.histogram(module_i)->fill(cell_parameter.getPedestal()-old_pedestal);
01597               noise_change_hist_arr.histogram(module_i)->fill(cell_parameter.getNoise()-old_noise);
01598             }
01599 #endif
01600 
01601           }
01602         }
01603 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
01604         else {
01605           n_dead++;
01606         }
01607 #endif
01608 
01609       }
01610       
01611       av_noise.calculate();
01612       _avNoisePerModule[module_i]=av_noise.mean();
01613 
01614 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
01615       histmgr::HistogramCollection_t & dead_hist_arr=histogramList->getHistogramCollection(_histGroupKey,_histKey[kH1DeadCells]);
01616       dead_hist_arr.histogram(module_i)->fill(n_dead);
01617 #endif  
01618     }
01619     if (_cellParameter.size()>0) {
01620       _pedestalNoiseIsKnown=kTRUE;
01621     }
01622 
01623     _nPedestalEventsTotal+=_nPedestalEvents;
01624     _nPedestalEvents=0;
01625   }
01626 
01627   void SimpleHitSearch::showNoiseStat() const
01628   {
01629     for(UInt_t module_i=0; module_i<_cellParameter.size(); module_i++) {
01630       Average_t noise;
01631       Average_t pedestal;
01632       UInt_t n_dead=0;
01633       for(UInt_t cell_i=0; cell_i<_cellParameter[module_i].size(); cell_i++) {
01634         const CellParameter &cell_parameter=_cellParameter[module_i][cell_i];
01635         if (cell_parameter.isDead()) {
01636           n_dead++;
01637         }
01638         else {
01639           if (cell_parameter.getNValues()>0) {
01640             noise.add(cell_parameter.getNoise());
01641             pedestal.add(cell_parameter.getPedestal());
01642           }
01643         }
01644       }
01645       noise.calculate();
01646       pedestal.calculate();
01647       std::cout << module_i << ":" << " dead=" <<std::setw(4) << n_dead << " noise" <<  noise << " pedestal=" <<  pedestal << std::endl;
01648     }
01649   }
01650 
01651   void SimpleHitSearch::showCurrentNoiseStat() const
01652   {
01653     for(UInt_t module_i=0; module_i<_cellParameter.size(); module_i++) {
01654       Average_t noise;
01655       Average_t pedestal;
01656       UInt_t n_dead=0;
01657       for(UInt_t cell_i=0; cell_i<_cellParameter[module_i].size(); cell_i++) {
01658         const CellParameter &cell_parameter=_cellParameter[module_i][cell_i];
01659         if (cell_parameter.isDead()) {
01660           n_dead++;
01661         }
01662         else {
01663           if (cell_parameter.getNValues()>0) {
01664             noise.add(sqrt((cell_parameter.getOldNoise()-cell_parameter.getOldPedestal()*cell_parameter.getOldPedestal()/cell_parameter.getNValues())
01665                            /(cell_parameter.getNValues()-1)));
01666             pedestal.add(cell_parameter.getOldPedestal()/cell_parameter.getNValues());
01667           }
01668         }
01669       }
01670       noise.calculate();
01671       pedestal.calculate();
01672       std::cout << module_i << ":" << " dead=" <<std::setw(4) << n_dead << " noise" << std::setw(30) << noise << " pedestal=" << std::setw(30) << pedestal << std::endl;
01673     }
01674   }
01675 
01676   void SimpleHitSearch::searchHits(LCEvent *evtP) 
01677   {
01678     
01679     try {//try
01680       // DEBUG     
01681       Bool_t reject_event=false;
01682       LCCollection* col_adc = evtP->getCollection( _adcColName ) ;
01683 
01684       // determine number of hits per layer to reject dirty events.
01685       // FIXME: Good idea ? 
01686 
01687       UInt_t n_modules=_mapping.getNModules();
01688       vector<UInt_t> n_hits_per_module;
01689       n_hits_per_module.resize(n_modules,0);
01690       UInt_t max_n_hits=(UInt_t) (_maxHitOccupancy*_mapping.getNCellsTotal()+.5);
01691 
01692       vector<Float_t> pedestal_correction;
01693       pedestal_correction.resize(n_modules,0.);
01694 
01695 
01696 #ifdef CORRECT_SIGNAL_INDUCED_PED_SHIFT
01697       map<UInt_t, vector<Float_t> > signal_induced_pedestal_correction;
01698       signal_induced_pedestal_correction.clear();
01699 #endif
01700 
01701 
01702 
01703 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
01704       // histogram the average noise per layer
01705 #  ifdef WITH_ALL_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
01706       std::vector< AverageSimple_t > noise_per_module; 
01707       noise_per_module.resize(n_modules);
01708 #  endif
01709       histmgr::HistMgr *histogramList=histmgr::HistMgr::getInstance();
01710       histmgr::HistogramCollection_t & pedestal_correction_per_layer_hist_arr=histogramList->getHistogramCollection(_histGroupKey,_histKey[kH1PedestalCorrection]);
01711       histmgr::HistogramCollection_t & signal_per_layer_hist_arr=histogramList->getHistogramCollection(_histGroupKey,_histKey[kH1Signal]);
01712       histmgr::HistogramCollection_t & signal_hist_arr=histogramList->getHistogramCollection(_histGroupKey,_histSignalKey);
01713       histmgr::HistogramCollection_t & noise_hist_arr= histogramList->getHistogramCollection(_histGroupKey,_histNoiseKey);
01714       histmgr::Histogram2DCollection_t & a_hist_col=histogramList->getHistogram2DCollection(_histGroupKey,_histNoiseCorrelationKey);
01715 #ifdef CORRECT_SIGNAL_INDUCED_PED_SHIFT
01716       histmgr::Histogram2DCollection_t & an_hist_col=histogramList->getHistogram2DCollection(_histGroupKey,_histSignalInducedPedestalShiftKey);
01717 #endif
01718 
01719 #  ifdef WITH_ALL_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
01720       histmgr::HistogramCollection_t & adc_per_layer_hist_arr=histogramList->getHistogramCollection(_histGroupKey,_histKey[kH1ADC]);
01721 #  endif
01722 #endif
01723 
01724       if (_cellParameter.size()==0) {
01725         buildCellParameters();
01726       }
01727       //      std::cout << evtP->getEventNumber() << std::endl;
01728       LCCollectionVec* col_rawhit=new LCCollectionVec( LCIO::RAWCALORIMETERHIT );
01729 #ifdef EXPORT_SIGNAL_TO_NOISE_RATIO
01730       LCFloatVec signal_over_noise_ratio;
01731 #endif
01732 
01733       //parameters will be saved in in vector of objects containing just noise and pedestal. This vector will be transmitted to the next processor thanks to the singleton getCellParameters();
01734       //if the flag _writeRawHits is set, will also save the parameters in a collection
01735       LCCollectionVec *ParamsColToSave=0;
01736       if (_writeRawHits) ParamsColToSave = new LCCollectionVec( LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT);
01737 
01738       NoiseParameterArray_t & noiseArray = getCellParameters();
01739       noiseArray.clear();
01740 
01741       //The fact that the array has to be of a certain size already at this stage
01742       //is to save time in the execution, as the vector will ultimately have this size
01743       if (noiseArray.size() != n_modules) noiseArray.resize(n_modules);
01744 
01745 
01746       LCFlagImpl hitFlag(col_rawhit->getFlag()) ;
01747       hitFlag.setBit( LCIO::RCHBIT_ID1) ;
01748       col_rawhit->setFlag( hitFlag.getFlag()  ) ;
01749       col_rawhit->setTransient(!(_writeRawHits));
01750       if (_writeRawHits) ParamsColToSave->setTransient(!(_writeRawHits));
01751 
01752       if (col_adc && col_adc->getNumberOfElements()>0) {//if elements in input col
01753 
01754         //      // for finding events with negative spikes
01755         //      std::vector<unsigned int> negative_signal;
01756         //      negative_signal.resize(n_modules,0);
01757 
01758 #ifdef CORRELATED_NOISE
01759 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
01760         std::vector<std::vector<std::pair<float,unsigned int> > > module_signal;
01761         module_signal.resize(n_modules);
01762         for (UInt_t module_i=0; module_i<n_modules;module_i++) {
01763           module_signal[module_i].resize(12*2);
01764           for (UInt_t chip_i=0; chip_i<2*12; chip_i++) {
01765             module_signal[module_i][chip_i].first=0.;
01766             module_signal[module_i][chip_i].second=0;
01767           }
01768         }
01769 #endif
01770 #endif
01771 
01772         Int_t minAdcSignalThreshold = _calibration->getMiniumADCForMipThreshold(_signalThreshold);
01773 
01774         CALICE::ErrorBits error(evtP->getParameters().getIntVal(PAR_ERROR_BITS));
01775         UInt_t n_cells_found=0;
01776         Double_t total_signal=0.;
01777 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
01778         //CRP test variables for debugging
01779         UInt_t n_cells_failed(0); 
01780         UInt_t ncellstotal(0); 
01781 #endif
01782 
01783         //The Adc Value Access Class reorganizes the ADC Blocks in terms of FE    
01784         AdcValueAccess adc_access(col_adc,&_mapping, _calibration, &_cellParameter);
01785         //Hence the following is actually a loop over the front ends
01786         while (adc_access.hasConnectedBlocks()) {//while connected blocks
01787           //  -- 1 --  copy the pedestal subtracted adc values of one module into a linear array - the modulebuffer
01788           UInt_t last_module_index[2]={UINT_MAX,UINT_MAX};
01789           UInt_t cells_per_module[2]={0,0};
01790 
01791           //This for loop with the help of the AdcValueAccess Class steps through the FEs
01792           //It breaks when the cells connected to a FE have been processed in the do loop
01793           //i.e. assigned to the modulebuffer which is then used for the further processing.
01794           //The counter in the ADC Value Access class is then set to the next connected FE in the
01795           for(;;) {//infinite for
01796 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
01797             assert( _moduleBuffer.size() >= _mapping.getNCellsPerModule(adc_access.getModuleIndex()) );
01798 #endif
01799     
01800             //Prepare th splitting of the modulebuffer into a part related to the left and to the right
01801             //side of a FE if necessary i.e. for the bottom slabs/layers
01802             UInt_t side;
01803             UInt_t buffer_side_offset;
01804             if (adc_access.isRightSide()) {
01805               side=1;
01806               buffer_side_offset=_moduleBuffer.size()/2;
01807             }
01808             else {
01809               side=0;
01810               buffer_side_offset=0;
01811             }
01812             //A new FE has been encountered (counter already set to next FE in AdcAccessValue class)
01813             if (static_cast<unsigned int>(adc_access.getModuleIndex()) != last_module_index[side] && last_module_index[side] < n_modules) break;
01814             
01815             last_module_index[side]=adc_access.getModuleIndex();
01816 
01817             //Loop over the cells connected to a frontend and fill of the modulebuffer
01818             do {//do loop
01819               CellParameter &cell_parameter=adc_access.getParameter();
01820               unsigned int cell_index=adc_access.getCellIndexOnModule()+buffer_side_offset;
01821 #ifdef Boundary_Check
01822               assert ( cell_index < _moduleBuffer.size());
01823 #endif
01824               if (!cell_parameter.isDead()) {
01825                 Int_t raw_adc_value=adc_access.getAdcValue();
01826                 if(raw_adc_value>=_adcRange[0] && raw_adc_value<=_adcRange[1]) {
01827 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
01828 #ifdef WITH_ALL_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
01829                   // TODO: histogram also values outside the valid range ?
01830                   adc_per_layer_hist_arr.histogram(adc_access.getModuleIndex())->fill(raw_adc_value);
01831 #endif
01832 #endif
01833                   _moduleBuffer[cell_index]=raw_adc_value-cell_parameter.getPedestal();
01834                 }
01835                 else {
01836                   cell_parameter.incrementSaturationCounter();
01837                   _moduleBuffer[cell_index]=+FLT_MAX;
01838                 }
01839               }
01840               else {
01841                 _moduleBuffer[cell_index]=+FLT_MAX;
01842               }
01843               cells_per_module[side]++;
01844             } while (adc_access.nextValue());
01845             if (!adc_access.nextBlock()) break;
01846           }//infinite for
01847 
01848 
01849 
01850           // -- 2 --  correct pedestals and search hits.
01851           //Loop over the two sides of the FE The Mapping decides whether a side is connected or not
01852           for (UInt_t side_i=0; side_i<2; side_i++) {//loop on type
01853             //Get the index of the module assigned to side_i
01854             UInt_t module_index=last_module_index[side_i];
01855             
01856             //This handles the cases where nothing has been plugged to the right side of a FE
01857             //i.e. in case of central slabs/layers
01858             if (module_index>= n_modules) continue; 
01859             //Shouldn't this be 
01860             if (cells_per_module[side_i] != _mapping.getNCellsPerModule( module_index )) break; 
01861 
01862             n_cells_found+=cells_per_module[side_i];
01863 
01864             Float_t *a_module_buffer=(side_i==0 ? &(_moduleBuffer[0]) : &(_moduleBuffer[_moduleBuffer.size()/2]));
01865             
01866             pedestal_correction[module_index]=calculatePedestalCorrection( module_index, a_module_buffer);
01867             if (pedestal_correction[module_index]>=FLT_MAX) {
01868               pedestal_correction[module_index]=0;
01869               error.setDirtyEvent();
01870             }
01871             else if (fabs(pedestal_correction[module_index])>_maxPedestalChange) {
01872               error.setCorruptEventRecord();
01873 
01874               // dump event
01875               if (adc_access.hasConnectedBlocks()) {
01876                 while (adc_access.nextBlock());
01877               }
01878               break;
01879             }
01880                      
01881 
01882 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
01883             pedestal_correction_per_layer_hist_arr.histogram(module_index)->fill(pedestal_correction[module_index]);
01884 #endif
01885             UInt_t n_chips_per_module = (cells_per_module[side_i]==216 ? 12 : 6);
01886 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
01887             histmgr::HistogramCollection_t &my_hist_col=histogramList->getHistogramCollection(_histGroupKey,_histKey[kH1NoGlobalPedCorr]);
01888             
01889             if(module_index==11) {
01890               for (UInt_t cell_i=0; cell_i<(cells_per_module[side_i]); cell_i++) {
01891                 my_hist_col.histogram(cell_i)->fill(a_module_buffer[cell_i]);
01892               }
01893             }
01894             histmgr::HistogramCollection_t &my2nd_hist_col=histogramList->getHistogramCollection(_histGroupKey,_histKey[kH1NoPedSh]);
01895 #endif
01896 
01897             // Apply global pedestal correction
01898             for (UInt_t cell_i=0; cell_i< cells_per_module[side_i] ; cell_i++) {//loop on cells
01899 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
01900             ncellstotal++;
01901 #endif
01902               if (a_module_buffer[cell_i]<FLT_MAX) {
01903                 CellParameter &cell_parameter=_cellParameter[module_index][cell_i];
01904 
01905                 //optim. float pedestal = cell_parameter.getPedestal();
01906                 //We do this since we might encounter a situation in which
01907                 //more modules are included in the simulation than were actually
01908                 //present in the data
01909                 //CAMM: needed ? SimpleHitSearch will not run on MC...
01910                 //if(module_index+1 > noiseArray.size()) noiseArray.resize(module_index+1); 
01911                 NoiseParameter noisePar(module_index,cell_i);
01912                 noiseArray[module_index].push_back(noisePar);
01913                 noisePar.setPedestalBeforeGC(cell_parameter.getPedestal());
01914                 noisePar.setNoiseBeforeGC(cell_parameter.getNoise());
01915 
01916                 // change pedestals
01917                 cell_parameter.setOldPedestal( cell_parameter.getPedestal());
01918                 cell_parameter.setPedestal( cell_parameter.getPedestal() + pedestal_correction[module_index]);
01919 
01920                 // Float_t pedestal=cell_parameter.getPedestal();
01921                 a_module_buffer[cell_i] -= pedestal_correction[module_index];
01922 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS  
01923                 if(module_index==11)
01924                   my2nd_hist_col.histogram(cell_i)->fill(a_module_buffer[cell_i]);
01925 #endif
01926               }
01927               else {
01928                 NoiseParameter noisePar(module_index,cell_i);
01929                 noisePar.setDead(2);
01930                 CellIndex ind(_mapping.getGeometricalCellIndex(module_index,cell_i));
01931                 int lay = ind.getLayerIndex()-1;
01932                 int waf = 3*(ind.getWaferColumn()-1) + ind.getWaferRow()-1 ;
01933                 int chan = 6*(ind.getPadColumn()-1) + ind.getPadRow()-1 ;
01934 
01935                 _isDead[lay][waf][chan] = 2;
01936                 //We do this since we might encounter a situation in which
01937                 //more modules are included in the simulation than were actually
01938                 //present in the data
01939                 //CAMM: I think we don't need that...
01940                 //if(module_index+1 > noiseArray.size()) { 
01941                   //Have to thing carefully whether we need that
01942                 //  numods = module_index+1;
01943                 //  noiseArray.resize(module_index+1);
01944                 //} 
01945                 noiseArray[module_index].push_back(noisePar);
01946               }
01947             }//loop on cells
01948             
01949 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
01950             assert (noiseArray[module_index].size() == cells_per_module[side_i]);
01951 #endif
01952 
01953              
01954 #ifdef CORRECT_SIGNAL_INDUCED_PED_SHIFT     
01955             // Apply global pedestal correction
01956             vector<Float_t> sips_correction_per_wafer;
01957             sips_correction_per_wafer.clear();
01958             sips_correction_per_wafer=calculateSignalInducedPedestalCorrection(module_index, a_module_buffer);
01959             signal_induced_pedestal_correction.insert(make_pair(module_index,sips_correction_per_wafer));
01960             
01961 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
01962             histmgr::HistogramCollection_t &my3rd_hist_col=histogramList->getHistogramCollection(_histGroupKey,_histKey[kH1PedSh]);
01963             vector<Float_t> total_signal_per_wafer;
01964             total_signal_per_wafer.resize(n_chips_per_module/2,0);
01965             for (UInt_t cell_i=0; cell_i< cells_per_module[side_i] ; cell_i++) {
01966               UInt_t of_chip = cell_i%n_chips_per_module;
01967               UInt_t on_wafer=of_chip/2;
01968               if (a_module_buffer[cell_i]<FLT_MAX) {
01969                 total_signal_per_wafer[on_wafer]+=a_module_buffer[cell_i]- signal_induced_pedestal_correction[module_index][on_wafer];
01970               }
01971             }
01972             //std::cout << "Before hist2D 1: " << std::endl;
01973             //histmgr::Histogram2DCollection_t an_hist_col=histogramList->getHistogram2DCollection(_histGroupKey,_histSignalInducedPedestalShiftKey);
01974             for (UInt_t wafer_i=0; wafer_i<(n_chips_per_module/2); wafer_i++) {
01975                an_hist_col.histogram(module_index,wafer_i)->fill(total_signal_per_wafer[wafer_i],signal_induced_pedestal_correction[module_index][wafer_i]);     
01976             }
01977 #endif
01978 #endif
01979 
01980             for (UInt_t cell_i=0; cell_i< cells_per_module[side_i] ; cell_i++) {//loop on cells
01981 #ifdef CORRECT_SIGNAL_INDUCED_PED_SHIFT
01982               UInt_t of_chip = cell_i%n_chips_per_module;
01983               UInt_t on_wafer=of_chip/2;
01984 #endif
01985               if (a_module_buffer[cell_i]<FLT_MAX) {
01986                 CellParameter &cell_parameter=_cellParameter[module_index][cell_i];
01987                 NoiseParameter &noisePar = noiseArray[module_index][cell_i];
01988                 noisePar.setPedestalBeforeSIC(cell_parameter.getPedestal());
01989                 noisePar.setNoiseBeforeSIC(cell_parameter.getNoise());
01990 #ifdef CORRECT_SIGNAL_INDUCED_PED_SHIFT     
01991                 // change pedestals for signal induced shifts
01992                 a_module_buffer[cell_i] -= signal_induced_pedestal_correction[module_index][on_wafer];  
01993 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS  
01994                 if(module_index==11)
01995                   my3rd_hist_col.histogram(cell_i)->fill(a_module_buffer[cell_i]);
01996 #endif
01997 #endif
01998                 Float_t adc_value=a_module_buffer[cell_i];
01999                 Float_t noise=cell_parameter.getNoise();
02000                 Bool_t isDead = cell_parameter.isDead();
02001 
02002                 noisePar.setPedestal(cell_parameter.getPedestal());
02003                 noisePar.setNoise(cell_parameter.getNoise());
02004                 noisePar.setDead(isDead);
02005 
02006                 // buffer the calibrated value, to avoid a recalculation
02007                 Float_t calibrated_value = getCalibratedValue(module_index, cell_i, adc_value);
02008 
02009                 // signals are considered to be hits if 
02010                 //  1. the signal passes the noise cut
02011                 //  2. the uncalibrated signal passes the minimum threshold in ADC which is for all pads smaller or equal then the
02012                 //     signal threshold 
02013                 //  3. the calibrated signal is above the signal threshold
02014 
02015                 //the following if-else is just to fill control histograms,
02016                 //and to reject events with errors.
02017 
02018                 if (   adc_value>minAdcSignalThreshold
02019                        && adc_value>noise*_noiseCut 
02020                        && calibrated_value>_signalThreshold ) {//signal
02021                   if (static_cast<UInt_t>(col_rawhit->getNumberOfElements()) >max_n_hits) {
02022                     reject_event=true;
02023                     _rejectBecauseTooManyHits++;
02024                   }
02025                   else {
02026                     cell_parameter.incrementNHits();
02027                     // UInt_t n_hits=cell_parameter.getNHits();
02028                     
02029 #ifdef EXPORT_SIGNAL_TO_NOISE_RATIO
02030                     signal_over_noise_ratio.push_back(adc_value/noise);
02031 #endif
02032                     // count the hits per module to reject events with too many hits
02033 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
02034                     if (module_index>=n_hits_per_module.size()) {
02035                       throw std::logic_error("SimpleHitSearch::SearchHits>Module index out of bounds.");
02036                     }
02037 #endif
02038                     n_hits_per_module[module_index]++;
02039                     
02040 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
02041                     // \todo in principle the signal histograms per module can be calculated by
02042                     //       summing all the individual signal histograms.
02043                     //       * this would speed up the processing, and
02044                     //       * reduce memory consumption slightly
02045                     //       * but: would require to implement a method in the histogram display to automatically
02046                     //         sum all the histograms of the same major index.
02047                     
02048                     // for online monitoring:
02049                     signal_per_layer_hist_arr.histogram(module_index)->fill(calibrated_value);
02050                     
02051                     // for checking individual pads:
02052                     signal_hist_arr.histogram(module_index,cell_i)->fill(calibrated_value);
02053 #endif
02054                   }
02055                 }//signal
02056                 else {
02057                   // -- noise
02058 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
02059                   
02060 #  ifdef WITH_ALL_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
02061                   noise_per_module[module_index].add(adc_value);
02062 #  endif
02063 #  ifdef CORRELATED_NOISE
02064 #    ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
02065                   assert(module_index <module_signal.size());
02066 #    endif
02067                   unsigned int chip_i=cell_i%12;
02068                   unsigned int channel_i=cell_i/12;
02069                   module_signal[module_index][chip_i*2+channel_i%2].first+=adc_value;
02070                   module_signal[module_index][chip_i*2+channel_i%2].second++;
02071 #  endif
02072                   // TODO: only histogram the uncalibrated value, is that a good idea ?
02073                   //              dynamic_cast<histmgr::FloatHistogram1D*>(_histCol[kH1Noise]->getElementAt(adc_access.getModuleIndex()))->fill(adc_value);
02074                   noise_hist_arr.histogram(module_index,cell_i)->fill(adc_value);
02075 #endif
02076 
02077                   //for the noise in MC, fill histograms that will be fitted in the end() method, in order to get the values for the MC reco.
02078                   CellIndex ind(_mapping.getGeometricalCellIndex(module_index,cell_i));
02079                   int lay = ind.getLayerIndex()-1;
02080                   int waf = 3*(ind.getWaferColumn()-1) + ind.getWaferRow()-1 ;
02081                   int chan = 6*(ind.getPadColumn()-1) + ind.getPadRow()-1 ;
02082 
02083                   //if that is not verified, the program will crash because histogram will not exist...
02084                   if (lay > 29 || waf > 8 || chan > 35){
02085                     std::stringstream message;
02086                     message << "SimpleHitSearch::SearchHit> Something is wrong with the layer, wafer or cell indices in module_index " 
02087                             << module_index << ": K=" << ind.getLayerIndex() << ", S=" << ind.getWaferColumn() << ", M= " << ind.getWaferRow() << ", I=" << ind.getPadRow() << ", and J=" << ind.getPadColumn() << std::endl;
02088                     throw runtime_error(message.str());
02089                   }
02090 
02091                   if (adc_value<minAdcSignalThreshold && adc_value<noise*_noiseCut) p_Ped[lay][waf][chan]->Fill(adc_value);
02092                   _isDead[lay][waf][chan] = cell_parameter.isDead();
02093 
02094                 }//noise                  
02095                 // -- save everybody in the RawHits collection
02096                 IMPL::RawCalorimeterHitImpl *hit=new IMPL::RawCalorimeterHitImpl;
02097                 // FIXME: put MOKKA cell id 
02098                 hit->setCellID0(_mapping.getGeometricalCellIndex(module_index,cell_i));
02099                 
02100                 noisePar.setGeomCellIndex(hit->getCellID0());
02101                 UInt_t module_type = _mapping.getModuleType(module_index);
