02102                 UInt_t module_id   = _mapping.getModuleID(module_index);
02103                 CellIndex dec(hit->getCellID0(),module_index,module_type,module_id,cell_i,isDead);
02104                 
02105                 hit->setCellID1(dec.getSecondIndex());
02106 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
02107                 if ( !(dec.getLayerIndex() >= 1 && dec.getLayerIndex() <= 30) ||
02108                      !(dec.getWaferRow() >= 1 && dec.getWaferRow() <= 3) ||
02109                      !(dec.getWaferColumn() >= 1 && dec.getWaferColumn() <= 3)||
02110                      !(dec.getPadRow() >= 1 && dec.getPadRow() <= 6)||
02111                      !(dec.getPadColumn() >= 1 && dec.getPadColumn() <= 6))
02112                   {
02113                     std::cout << " WRONG decoding of indices ! " << std::endl <<
02114                       " Layer = " << dec.getLayerIndex() << std::endl <<
02115                       " Wafer Row (M) = " << dec.getWaferRow() << std::endl <<
02116                       " Wafer Column (S) = " << dec.getWaferColumn() << std::endl <<
02117                       " Pad Row (I) = " << dec.getPadRow() << std::endl <<
02118                       " Pad Column (J) = " << dec.getPadColumn() <<  std::endl <<
02119                       " ...........Exiting........." << std::endl;
02120                     exit(0);
02121                   }
02122 #endif
02123                 
02124                 hit->setTimeStamp(evtP->getTimeStamp());
02125                 
02126                 total_signal += adc_value;
02127                 assert ((fabs(adc_value)*10000+0.5) < FLT_MAX);
02128                 int rawAmpl = 0;
02129                 if (adc_value >= 0.0) rawAmpl = static_cast<int>(adc_value*10000+0.5);
02130                 else rawAmpl = static_cast<int>(adc_value*10000-0.5);
02131                 hit->setAmplitude(rawAmpl);
02132                 col_rawhit->addElement(hit);
02133 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
02134               } else {
02135                 std::cout << "Cell failed:" << std::endl;
02136                 std::cout << "ModuleName " << _mapping.getModuleName(module_index) << std::endl; 
02137                 std::cout << "cell " << cell_i << std::endl; 
02138                 n_cells_failed++;
02139 #endif
02140               }//protec
02141             }//loop on cells
02142           }//loop on type  
02143         }//while connected blocks
02144         
02145         //CAMM: fill a collection with the noise parameters of all connected cells.
02146         if (_writeRawHits){
02147 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
02148           assert (noiseArray.size() == n_modules);
02149 #endif
02150           for (UInt_t mod = 0; mod < n_modules; mod++){//loop on modules
02151             for (UInt_t cell = 0; cell < _mapping.getNCellsPerModule(mod); cell++){
02152               LCGenericObjectImpl *obj = new LCGenericObjectImpl(4,0,7);
02153               LCPayload<NoiseParameter> cte(noiseArray[mod][cell],*obj);
02154               ParamsColToSave->addElement(obj) ;
02155             }
02156           }//loop on modules
02157         }
02158         
02159 #ifdef CORRELATED_NOISE
02160 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
02161         //std::cout << "Before hist2D 2: " << std::endl;
02162         //histmgr::Histogram2DCollection_t a_hist_col=histogramList->getHistogram2DCollection(_histGroupKey,_histNoiseCorrelationKey);
02163 #  ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
02164         assert(a_hist_col.n() >= module_signal.size());
02165 #  endif
02166         for (UInt_t module_i=0; module_i<module_signal.size(); module_i++) {
02167           for (UInt_t chip_i=0; chip_i<12; chip_i++) {
02168             if (module_signal[module_i][chip_i+0].second>0 && module_signal[module_i][chip_i+1].second>0) {
02169               a_hist_col.histogram(module_i,chip_i)->fill(module_signal[module_i][chip_i+0].first/module_signal[module_i][chip_i+0].second,
02170                                                           module_signal[module_i][chip_i+1].first/module_signal[module_i][chip_i+1].second);
02171             }
02172           }
02173         }
02174 #endif
02175 #endif
02176         
02177         //currently empty by default...
02178         if (!_parNamePedestalCorrection.empty() && !pedestal_correction.empty()) {
02179           evtP->parameters().setValues(_parNamePedestalCorrection,pedestal_correction);
02180         }
02181         
02182         
02183         if (n_cells_found != _mapping.getNConnectedCells()) {
02184           error.setMissingADCBlock();
02185           _nEventsWithMissingAdcBlocks++;
02186         }
02187         else {
02188           if (!_parNameEventEnergy.empty()) {
02189             evtP->parameters().setValue(_parNameEventEnergy,static_cast<Float_t>(total_signal));
02190           }
02191 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
02192           histmgr::HistogramCollection_t & total_signal_hist_arr=histogramList->getHistogramCollection(_histGroupKey,_histKey[kH1TotalSignal]);
02193           total_signal_hist_arr.histogram(0)->fill(total_signal);
02194 #endif
02195         }
02196         
02197 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
02198 #  ifdef WITH_ALL_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
02199         {
02200           UInt_t module_i=0;
02201           histmgr::HistogramCollection_t & nhits_hist_arr=histogramList->getHistogramCollection(_histGroupKey,_histKey[kH1NHits]);
02202           histmgr::HistogramCollection_t & noise_average_hist_arr=histogramList->getHistogramCollection(_histGroupKey,_histKey[kH1NoiseAverage]);
02203           histmgr::HistogramCollection_t & pedestal_average_hist_arr=histogramList->getHistogramCollection(_histGroupKey,_histKey[kH1SignalAverage]);
02204           for (vector<AverageSimple_t>::iterator iter=noise_per_module.begin();
02205                iter!=noise_per_module.end();
02206                iter++,module_i++) {
02207             iter->calculate();
02208             
02209             noise_average_hist_arr.histogram(module_i)->fill(iter->sigma());
02210             pedestal_average_hist_arr.histogram(module_i)->fill(iter->mean());
02211             nhits_hist_arr.histogram(module_i)->fill(n_hits_per_module[module_i]);
02212           }
02213         }
02214 #  else
02215         histmgr::HistogramCollection_t & nhits_hist_arr=histogramList->getHistogramCollection(_histGroupKey,_histKey[kH1NHits]);
02216         for(UInt_t module_i=0; module_i<n_modules; module_i) {
02217           nhits_hist_arr.histogram(module_i)->fill(n_hits_per_module[module_i]);
02218         }
02219 #  endif
02220 #endif
02221 
02222 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
02223         std::cout << "hits=" << col_rawhit->getNumberOfElements() << std::endl;
02224         std::cout << "NCells not in collection=" << n_cells_failed << std::endl;
02225         std::cout << "Total cells present=" << ncellstotal << std::endl;
02226 #endif
02227         if (col_rawhit->getNumberOfElements()>0) {
02228 #ifdef EXPORT_SIGNAL_TO_NOISE_RATIO
02229           if (!signal_over_noise_ratio.empty()) {
02230             col_rawhit->parameters().setValues(std::string("SN"),signal_over_noise_ratio);
02231           }
02232 #endif
02233           
02234           if ( (error.getBits() & _errorMask ) ) {
02235             std::cerr << error << std::endl;
02236             if (error.missingADCBlock()) {
02237               _rejectBecauseOfMissingADCBlocks++;
02238             }
02239             reject_event=true;
02240             _rejectBecauseOfError++;
02241           }
02242           else {
02243             for (UInt_t module_i=0; module_i<n_hits_per_module.size(); module_i++) {
02244               if (n_hits_per_module[module_i]>_maxHitOccupancy * _mapping.getNCellsPerModule(module_i)) {
02245                 reject_event=true;
02246                 _rejectBecauseTooManyHits++;
02247               }
02248             }
02249           }
02250           if (!reject_event) {
02251             _nEventsWithHits++;
02252             //if (!(col_rawhit.isTransient())) 
02253             evtP->addCollection(col_rawhit,_rawhitColName);
02254             if (_writeRawHits) evtP->addCollection(ParamsColToSave,"EmcCellParametersSaved");
02255           }
02256           else {
02257             delete col_rawhit;
02258             if (_writeRawHits) delete ParamsColToSave;
02259             _rejectedEvents++;
02260           }
02261           }
02262           else {
02263             delete col_rawhit;
02264             if (_writeRawHits) delete ParamsColToSave;
02265           }
02266           if (error) {
02267             evtP->parameters().setValue(PAR_ERROR_BITS,error.getBits());
02268           }
02269           _nEvents++;
02270         }
02271         
02272       }
02273     catch (  DataNotAvailableException &err ) {
02274       _nEventsWithoutADC++;
02275     }
02276   }
02277     
02278   void SimpleHitSearch::searchHitsAndAdjustPedestalsAndNoise(LCEvent *evtP) {
02279       try {
02280         Bool_t reject_event=false;
02281         LCCollection* col_adc = evtP->getCollection( _adcColName ) ;
02282         
02283         // determine number of hits per layer to reject dirty events.
02284         // FIXME: Good idea ? 
02285         std::vector<UInt_t> n_hits_per_module;
02286         UInt_t n_modules=_mapping.getNModules();
02287         n_hits_per_module.resize(n_modules);
02288         UInt_t max_n_hits=(UInt_t) (_maxHitOccupancy*_mapping.getNCellsTotal()+.5);
02289         for (vector<UInt_t>::iterator iter=n_hits_per_module.begin(); iter != n_hits_per_module.end(); iter++) {
02290           *iter=0;
02291         }
02292 
02293 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
02294       // histogram the average noise per layer
02295         std::vector< AverageSimple_t > noise_per_module; 
02296         noise_per_module.resize(n_modules);
02297         
02298         histmgr::HistMgr *histogramList=histmgr::HistMgr::getInstance();
02299         histmgr::HistogramCollection_t & adc_per_layer_hist_arr=histogramList->getHistogramCollection(_histGroupKey,_histKey[kH1ADC]);
02300         histmgr::HistogramCollection_t & pedestal_per_layer_hist_arr=histogramList->getHistogramCollection(_histGroupKey,_histKey[kH1Pedestal]);
02301         histmgr::HistogramCollection_t & signal_hist_arr=histogramList->getHistogramCollection(_histGroupKey,_histSignalKey);
02302         histmgr::HistogramCollection_t & signal_per_layer_hist_arr=histogramList->getHistogramCollection(_histGroupKey,_histKey[kH1Signal]);
02303         histmgr::HistogramCollection_t & noise_hist_arr=histogramList->getHistogramCollection(_histGroupKey,_histNoiseKey);
02304         histmgr::HistogramCollection_t & noise_change_hist_arr=histogramList->getHistogramCollection(_histGroupKey,_histKey[kH1NoiseChange]);
02305         histmgr::HistogramCollection_t & pedestal_change_hist_arr=histogramList->getHistogramCollection(_histGroupKey,_histKey[kH1PedestalChange]);
02306 #endif
02307         
02308         if (_cellParameter.size()==0) {
02309           buildCellParameters();
02310         }
02311         //      std::cout << evtP->getEventNumber() << std::endl;
02312       LCCollection* col_hit=new LCCollectionVec( LCIO::CALORIMETERHIT );
02313 #ifdef EXPORT_SIGNAL_TO_NOISE_RATIO
02314       LCFloatVec signal_over_noise_ratio;
02315 #endif
02316       // write 3d coordinates
02317       LCFlagImpl hitFlag(col_hit->getFlag()) ;
02318       hitFlag.setBit( LCIO::RCHBIT_LONG) ;
02319       col_hit->setFlag( hitFlag.getFlag()  ) ;
02320       
02321       
02322       if (col_adc && col_adc->getNumberOfElements()>0) {
02323         
02324         // for finding events with negative spikes
02325         //      std::vector<unsigned int> negative_signal;
02326         //      negative_signal.resize(n_modules,0);
02327 
02328         Int_t minAdcSignalThreshold = _calibration->getMiniumADCForMipThreshold(_signalThreshold);
02329         
02330         CALICE::ErrorBits error(evtP->getParameters().getIntVal(PAR_ERROR_BITS));
02331         UInt_t n_cells_found=0;
02332 
02333         AdcValueAccess adc_access(col_adc,&_mapping, _calibration, &_cellParameter);
02334         if (adc_access.hasConnectedBlocks()) {
02335         do {
02336           do {
02337             // pedestals and noise are adjusted if not a hit
02338             CellParameter &cell_parameter=adc_access.getParameter();
02339             //#ifdef WITH_CELL_PAR_INDEX
02340             //      cell_parameter.setCellIndex(adc_access.getCellIndexOnModule());
02341             //      cell_parameter.setModuleIndex(adc_access.getModuleIndex());
02342             //#endif
02343             if (!cell_parameter.isDead()) {
02344             
02345               Int_t raw_adc_value=adc_access.getAdcValue();
02346               if(raw_adc_value>=_adcRange[0] && raw_adc_value<=_adcRange[1]) {
02347               
02348                 Float_t pedestal=cell_parameter.getPedestal();
02349                 Float_t adc_value=((Float_t) raw_adc_value) - pedestal;
02350 
02351 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
02352 #  ifdef WITH_ALL_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
02353                 adc_per_layer_hist_arr.histogram(adc_access.getModuleIndex())->fill(raw_adc_value);
02354                 pedestal_per_layer_hist_arr.histogram(adc_access.getModuleIndex())->fill(pedestal);
02355 #  endif
02356 #endif
02357               
02358                 Float_t noise=cell_parameter.getNoise();
02359                 // buffer the calibrated value, to avoid a recalculation
02360                 Float_t calibrated_value;
02361 
02362                 if (   adc_value>minAdcSignalThreshold
02363                     && adc_value>noise*_noiseCut
02364                     && (calibrated_value=adc_access.getCalibratedValue(pedestal))>_signalThreshold )
02365                   {
02366                     // -- signal
02367                     cell_parameter.incrementNHits();
02368 
02369                     if (static_cast<UInt_t>(col_hit->getNumberOfElements())>max_n_hits) {
02370                       reject_event=true;
02371                       _rejectBecauseTooManyHits++;
02372                     }
02373                     else {
02374                       IMPL::CalorimeterHitImpl *hit=new IMPL::CalorimeterHitImpl;
02375                       hit->setCellID0(adc_access.getGeometricalCellIndex());
02376 
02377                       //DEBUG:  hit->setCellID1(adc_access.getCellIndexOnModule() & 0xffff+((adc_access.getModuleIndex() & 0x7fff)<<16));
02378                       hit->setTime(evtP->getTimeStamp());
02379 
02380                       hit->setEnergy( calibrated_value );
02381                       hit->setPosition(adc_access.getPosition().data());
02382                       
02383                       col_hit->addElement(hit);
02384 
02385 #ifdef EXPORT_SIGNAL_TO_NOISE_RATIO
02386                       signal_over_noise_ratio.push_back(adc_value/noise);
02387 #endif
02388 
02389                       // count the hits per module to reject events with too many hits
02390 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
02391                       if (static_cast<UInt_t>(adc_access.getModuleIndex())>=n_hits_per_module.size()) {
02392                         throw std::logic_error("SimpleHitSearch::SearchHits>Module index out of bounds.");
02393                       }
02394 #endif
02395                       n_hits_per_module[adc_access.getModuleIndex()]++;
02396 
02397 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
02398                       signal_per_layer_hist_arr.histogram(adc_access.getModuleIndex())->fill(calibrated_value);
02399                       signal_hist_arr.histogram(adc_access.getModuleIndex(),adc_access.getCellIndexOnModule())->fill(calibrated_value);
02400 
02401 #endif
02402 
02403                     }
02404                   }
02405                 else {
02406                   // -- noise
02407                   cell_parameter.adjustPedestalNoise(raw_adc_value, _weightOfOldPedestalNoise );
02408 
02409 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
02410                   noise_per_module[adc_access.getModuleIndex()].add(adc_value);
02411 
02412                   pedestal_change_hist_arr.histogram(adc_access.getModuleIndex())
02413                     ->fill(cell_parameter.getPedestal()-cell_parameter.getOldPedestal());
02414 
02415                   noise_change_hist_arr.histogram(adc_access.getModuleIndex())
02416                     ->fill(cell_parameter.getNoise()-cell_parameter.getOldNoise());
02417 
02418                   // TODO: only histogram the uncalibrated value, is that a good idea ?
02419                   //dynamic_cast<histmgr::FloatHistogram1D*>(_histCol[kH1Noise]->getElementAt(adc_access.getModuleIndex()))->fill(adc_value);
02420                   noise_hist_arr.histogram(adc_access.getModuleIndex(),adc_access.getCellIndexOnModule())->fill(adc_value);
02421 #endif
02422 
02423                   // identify negative spikes
02424                   // if ( adc_value < -noise*_noiseCutForPedestalNoiseCalculation ) {
02425                   //  negative_signal[adc_access.getModuleIndex()]++;
02426                   //}
02427 
02428                 }
02429               }
02430               else {
02431                 cell_parameter.incrementSaturationCounter();
02432               }
02433             }  
02434 
02435             n_cells_found++;
02436 
02437           } while (adc_access.nextValue());
02438         } while (adc_access.nextBlock());
02439 
02440         //      for (std::vector<unsigned int>::iterator module_iter=negative_signal.begin(); 
02441         //           module_iter!=negative_signal.end();
02442         //           module_iter++) {
02443         //        if ( *module_iter > static_cast<unsigned int>(_nNegativeSignalsPerModule) ) {
02444         //          error.setLargeNegativeSignal();
02445         //        }
02446         //      }
02447 
02448         }
02449         //      std::cout << "hits=" << col_hit->getNumberOfElements() << std::endl;
02450 
02451         if (n_cells_found != _mapping.getNConnectedCells()) {
02452           error.setMissingADCBlock();
02453         }
02454 
02455 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
02456         histmgr::HistogramCollection_t & av_signal_hist_arr=histogramList->getHistogramCollection(_histGroupKey,_histKey[kH1SignalAverage]);
02457         histmgr::HistogramCollection_t & av_noise_hist_arr=histogramList->getHistogramCollection(_histGroupKey,_histKey[kH1NoiseAverage]);
02458         histmgr::HistogramCollection_t & n_hits_hist_arr=histogramList->getHistogramCollection(_histGroupKey,_histKey[kH1NHits]);
02459 
02460         UInt_t module_i=0;
02461         for (vector<AverageSimple_t>::iterator iter=noise_per_module.begin();
02462              iter!=noise_per_module.end();
02463              iter++,module_i++) {
02464           iter->calculate();
02465           av_noise_hist_arr.histogram(module_i)->fill(iter->sigma());
02466           av_signal_hist_arr.histogram(module_i)->fill(iter->mean());
02467           n_hits_hist_arr.histogram(module_i)->fill(n_hits_per_module[module_i]);
02468         }
02469 #endif
02470 
02471         if (col_hit->getNumberOfElements()>0 ) {
02472 #ifdef EXPORT_SIGNAL_TO_NOISE_RATIO
02473           if (!signal_over_noise_ratio.empty()) {
02474             col_hit->parameters().setValues(std::string("SN"),signal_over_noise_ratio);
02475           }
02476 #endif
02477           
02478           if ( (error.getBits() & _errorMask ) ) {
02479             reject_event=true;
02480             if (error.missingADCBlock()) {
02481               _rejectBecauseOfMissingADCBlocks++;
02482             }
02483             _rejectBecauseOfError++;
02484           }
02485           else {
02486             for (UInt_t module_i=0; module_i<n_hits_per_module.size(); module_i++) {
02487               if (n_hits_per_module[module_i]>_maxHitOccupancy * _mapping.getNCellsPerModule(module_i)) {
02488                 reject_event=true;
02489                 _rejectBecauseTooManyHits++;
02490               }
02491             }
02492           }
02493           if (!reject_event) {
02494             _nEventsWithHits++;
02495             evtP->addCollection(col_hit,_hitColName);
02496           }
02497           else {
02498             delete col_hit;
02499             _rejectedEvents++;
02500           }
02501         }
02502         else {
02503           delete col_hit;
02504         }
02505 
02506         if (error) {
02507           evtP->parameters().setValue(PAR_ERROR_BITS,error.getBits());
02508         }
02509         _nEvents++;
02510       }
02511 
02512     }
02513     catch (  DataNotAvailableException &err ) {
02514       _nEventsWithoutADC++;
02515     }
02516 
02517   }
02518 
02519   void SimpleHitSearch::buildCellParameters() 
02520   {
02521     const UInt_t n_modules=_mapping.getNModules();
02522 
02523     // verify that the calibration object is sane
02524     for (UInt_t module_i=0; module_i<n_modules; module_i++) {
02525       if (_mapping.isModuleConnected(module_i)) {
02526         if (!_calibration->checkForCalibrationConstantsOfModule(_mapping.getModuleID(module_i),
02527                                                                 _mapping.getModuleType(module_i),
02528                                                                 _mapping.getNCellsPerModule(module_i))) {
02529           std::stringstream message;
02530           message << "SimpleHitSearch::buildCellParameters> Calibration invalide for " 
02531                   << _mapping.getModuleName(module_i)
02532                   << " (cells="  << _mapping.getNCellsPerModule(module_i) <<")"
02533                   << ".";
02534           throw runtime_error(message.str());
02535         }
02536         
02537       }
02538     }
02539     
02540     // build the array which stores the pedestals, the noise and the cell status
02541     // and flag cells dead if the module is not connected or if the calibration 
02542     // constants are outside the valid range .
02543     delete _cellParameterCollection;
02544     _cellParameterCollection=new LCCollectionVec( LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT );
02545     lcio::IntVec index_array;
02546     if (_cellParameter.size()!=n_modules) {
02547       _cellParameter.resize(n_modules);
02548       for (UInt_t module_i=0; module_i<n_modules; module_i++) {
02549         UInt_t cells_per_module=_mapping.getNCellsPerModule(module_i);
02550         //      _cellParameter[module_i].resize(cells_per_module);
02551         index_array.push_back(_cellParameterCollection->getNumberOfElements());
02552         for (UInt_t cell_i=0; cell_i<cells_per_module; cell_i++) {
02553           LCGenericObject *an_obj=new LCGenericObjectImpl(kNCellParameterInts,kNCellParameterFloats,0);
02554           _cellParameterCollection->addElement(an_obj);
02555           _cellParameter[module_i].push_back(CellParameter(an_obj));
02556           if (_mapping.isCellDead(module_i,cell_i) || !_calibration->isValid(_mapping.getModuleID(module_i),_mapping.getModuleType(module_i),cell_i)) {
02557             _cellParameter[module_i].back().setDead();
02558           }
02559         }
02560       }
02561       index_array.push_back(_cellParameterCollection->getNumberOfElements());
02562       if (!index_array.empty()) {
02563         _cellParameterCollection->parameters().setValues(std::string("ModuleStartIndex"),index_array);
02564       }
02565 
02566       //      UInt_t module_i=0;
02567       //      for (CellParameterArray_t::iterator module_iter=_cellParameter.begin();
02568       //           module_iter!=_cellParameter.end();
02569       //           module_iter++,module_i++) {
02570       //        const UInt_t cells_per_module=_mapping.getNCellsPerModule(module_i);
02571       //        _cellParameter[module_i].resize(cells_per_module);
02572       //        UInt_t cell_i=0;
02573       //        for (CellParameterPerModuleArray_t::iterator cell_iter=module_iter->begin();
02574       //             cell_iter!=module_iter->end();
02575       //             cell_iter++,cell_i++) {
02576       //          if (_mapping.isCellDead(module_i,cell_i)) {
02577       //            _cellParameter[module_i][cell_i].setDead();
02578       //          }
02579       //        }
02580       //      }
02581     }
02582     
02583   }
02584 
02585   void SimpleHitSearch::end()
02586   {//end method
02587 
02588     if ( !_pedestalNoiseIsKnown) {
02589       if (_nPedestalEvents>(UInt_t) _minNEventsForPedestalNoiseUpdate) {
02590         //        UInt_t used_pedestal_events=_nPedestalEvents;
02591         calculatePedestalNoiseAndDeclareCellsDead();
02592       }
02593     }
02594 
02595 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
02596     histmgr::HistMgr *histogramList=histmgr::HistMgr::getInstance();
02597     histmgr::HistogramCollection_t & pedestal_hist_arr=histogramList->getHistogramCollection(_histGroupKey,_histKey[kH1FinalPedestal]);
02598     histmgr::HistogramCollection_t & noise_hist_arr=histogramList->getHistogramCollection(_histGroupKey,_histKey[kH1FinalNoise]);
02599 #endif
02600 
02601     for(UInt_t module_i=0; module_i<_cellParameter.size(); module_i++) {
02602       for(UInt_t cell_i=0; cell_i<_cellParameter[module_i].size(); cell_i++) {
02603         CellParameter &cell_parameter=_cellParameter[module_i][cell_i];
02604         if (!cell_parameter.isDead()) {
02605 
02606 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
02607           pedestal_hist_arr.histogram(module_i)->fill(cell_parameter.getPedestal());
02608           noise_hist_arr.histogram(module_i)->fill(cell_parameter.getNoise());
02609 #endif
02610         }
02611 
02612       }
02613     }
02614 
02615 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
02616     histogramList->unlockGroup(_histGroupKey);
02617 #endif
02618 
02619     _nEventsTotal         += _nEvents;
02620     _nEventsWithHitsTotal += _nEventsWithHits;
02621     _nPedestalEventsTotal += _nPedestalEvents;
02622 
02623     _nEvents=0;
02624     _nEventsWithHits=0;
02625     _nPedestalEvents=0;
02626 
02627     std::cout << "--- " << name() << " Report :" << std::endl;
02628     std::cout << std::setw(8) << _nEventsSkipped              << " events skipped." << std::endl;
02629     if (_skipDirtyEventsInPedestalCalculation > 0) {
02630       std::cout << std::setw(8) << _skipDirtyEventsInPedestalCalculation << " dirty events skipped during pedestal calculation." << std::endl;
02631     }
02632     std::cout << std::setw(8) << _nEventsTotal                << " events processed." << std::endl
02633               << std::setw(8) << _nEventsWithHitsTotal        << " events with hits (fraction " 
02634               << (_nEventsTotal>0 ? (Float_t) _nEventsWithHitsTotal/_nEventsTotal : 0.) << ")." << std::endl
02635               << std::setw(8) << _rejectedEvents              << " rejected events (fraction " 
02636               << (_nEventsTotal>0 ? (Float_t) _rejectedEvents/_nEventsTotal : 0.) << ")." << std::endl;
02637 
02638     if (_rejectedEvents>0) {
02639       std::cout << std::setw(10) <<  _rejectBecauseTooManyHits  << " rejected because too many hits." << std::endl
02640                 << std::setw(10) <<  _rejectBecauseOfError          << " rejected because of an error" << std::endl
02641                 << std::setw(10) <<   _rejectBecauseOfMissingADCBlocks << " rejected because of missing ADC blocks." << std::endl;
02642     }
02643     
02644     std::cout << std::setw(8) <<   _nPedestalEventsTotal        << " events used for pedestal noise calculation in " << std::endl
02645               << std::setw(8)  << _nPedestalEventSets << " sets (random trigger sets)." << std::endl
02646               << std::setw(8) << _uncoveredTriggerCounter     << " triggers not handled." << std::endl
02647               << std::setw(8) << _nEventsWithoutADC           << " events without ADC information." << " " << std::endl
02648               << std::setw(8) << _nEventsWithMissingAdcBlocks << " events with missing ADC blocks." << " " << std::endl
02649               << std::endl
02650               << " -  Noise statistics :" << std::endl;
02651     showNoiseStat();
02652     std::cout << std::endl;
02653 
02654     _cellParameter.clear();
02655     delete _cellParameterCollection;
02656     _cellParameterCollection=0;
02657 
02658     //now fit the histograms with the pedestals in noise selection in signal events, to extract the noise per channel for MC reco
02659     //save that in the database
02660     //LCWriter* wrt = LCFactory::getInstance()->createLCWriter() ;
02661     //std::ostringstream filename;
02662     //filename << "cellPars_" << _runnum << ".slcio";
02663     //wrt->open(filename.str(), LCIO::WRITE_NEW )  ;
02664     // create and add a run header to the file 
02665     // this isn't needed by LCCD but allows to use the 'dumpevent' tool
02666     //LCRunHeader* rHdr = new LCRunHeaderImpl ;
02667     //wrt->writeRunHeader( rHdr ) ;
02668 
02669     //Since there might be a lot of others files created in the course
02670     //of the reconstruction it is recommended to link explicitly to
02671     //the file to be filled
02672     if ( _hfile ) _hfile->cd();
02673     //--------- create event with one collection --------------
02674     //LCEvent* evt = new LCEventImpl ;
02675     LCCollectionVec* newcol = new LCCollectionVec( LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT ) ;
02676     TH1F *hchi2 = new TH1F("hchi2","Chi2;#chi^{2}",2000,0,2000);
02677     TH1F *hchi2ndf = new TH1F("hchi2ndf","Chi2/ndf;#chi^{2}/ndf",200,0,100);
02678     TF1 *gauss = new TF1("gauss","gaus",-500,500);
02679 
02680     for (int k = 0; k < 30; k++){
02681       for (int s = 0; s < 3; s++){
02682         for (int m = 0; m < 3; m++){
02683           for (int j = 0; j < 6; j++){
02684             for (int i = 0; i < 6; i++){
02685               //float fillnoise = 6.0;
02686               //if (NUM[k][3*s+m][6*j+i] != 0) _noise[k][3*s+m][6*j+i]/NUM[k][3*s+m][6*j+i];
02687               CellIndex dec(m+1,s+1,i+1,j+1,k+1);
02688               NoiseParameter parVal(dec.getCellIndex(),0,0,6.0,0.0);
02689               int waf = 3*s+m;
02690               int chan = 6*j+i;
02691               if (p_Ped[k][waf][chan]->GetEntries() != 0){//histo with entries
02692                 parVal.setDead(_isDead[k][waf][chan]);
02693 
02694                 gauss->SetParameters(1000,0,6);
02695                 p_Ped[k][waf][chan]->Fit("gauss","RQ0","",p_Ped[k][waf][chan]->GetMean()-5*fabs(p_Ped[k][waf][chan]->GetRMS()),p_Ped[k][waf][chan]->GetMean()+1*fabs(p_Ped[k][waf][chan]->GetRMS()));
02696                 if (_hfile) p_Ped[k][waf][chan]->Write();
02697 
02698                 if (gauss->GetNDF() != 0){//valid chi2/ndf
02699                   if ((fabs(gauss->GetParameter(1)) < 6 && fabs(gauss->GetParameter(2)) < 20 && fabs(gauss->GetParameter(2)) > 4.5) || gauss->GetChisquare()/gauss->GetNDF() < 3) {//valid fit
02700 
02701                     parVal.setNoise(gauss->GetParameter(2));
02702                     parVal.setPedestal(gauss->GetParameter(1));
02703                     //NoiseParameter parVal(dec.getCellIndex(),0,0,dataNoise[k][3*s+m][6*j+i],_mean[k][3*s+m][6*j+i]);
02704                     hchi2->Fill(gauss->GetChisquare());
02705                     hchi2ndf->Fill(gauss->GetChisquare()/gauss->GetNDF());
02706                   }
02707                   else {//save histos
02708 
02709                     hchi2->Fill(gauss->GetChisquare());
02710                     hchi2ndf->Fill(gauss->GetChisquare()/gauss->GetNDF());
02711                     //p_Ped[k][waf][chan]->Write();
02712 
02713                     //parVal.setNoise(gauss->GetParameter(2));
02714                     //parVal.setPedestal(gauss->GetParameter(1));
02715                     //NoiseParameter parVal(dec.getCellIndex(),0,0,dataNoise[k][3*s+m][6*j+i],_mean[k][3*s+m][6*j+i]);
02716 
02717                   }//save histos
02718                 }//if valid chi2/ndf
02719               }//histo with entries
02720               else {
02721                 parVal.setDead(_isDead[k][waf][chan]);
02722               }
02723               LCPayload<NoiseParameter> cte(parVal);
02724               LCGenericObject* obj = cte.output();
02725               newcol->addElement(obj);
02726             }
02727           }
02728         }
02729       }
02730     }//loop on k
02731 
02732     if (_saveEcalNoise){
02733       lccd::DBInterface db( _dbInit , _folderNoise , true ) ;
02734       std::cout << " ------> Database has been accessed, now writting the new collection." << std::endl;
02735       //..and finally store the collection
02736       std::string description = "NoiseParameters";
02737 
02738       db.storeCollection(lccd::LCCDTimeStamp((_runInfo.runStart()).timeStamp()),lccd::LCCDTimeStamp((_runInfo.runEnd()).timeStamp()),newcol,description);
02739       std::cout << " ------> Collection : " << _folderNoise << " has been successfully stored between : " << (_runInfo.runStart()).getDateString() << " and " << (_runInfo.runEnd()).getDateString() << std::endl;
02740     }
02741 
02742     //evt->addCollection(newcol,"NoiseParameters");
02743     //evt->parameters().setValue("RunNum", _runnum ) ;
02744     //wrt->writeEvent( evt ) ; 
02745     // --- clean up ---
02746     //delete evt ;
02747     //wrt->close() ;
02748 
02749     if ( _hfile ){
02750       hchi2->Write();
02751       hchi2ndf->Write();
02752       _hfile->Write();
02753       _hfile->Close();
02754       delete _hfile;
02755       _hfile = 0;
02756     } else {
02757       std::cout << " *** ERROR ***   SimpleHitSearch::end() - " 
02758                 << "Could not open output file for histograms"
02759                 << std::endl;
02760     }
02761 
02762   }//end method
02763

02766   NoiseParameterArray_t & SimpleHitSearch::getCellParameters() {
02767     static NoiseParameterArray_t params;
02768     return params;
02769   }

02771   void SimpleHitSearch::moduleTypeChanged(lcio::LCCollection* col) {
02772     VRawADCValueProcessor::moduleTypeChanged(col);
02773     // maybe the number of cells per module changed
02774     if (_cellParameter.size()>0) {
02775       _cellParameter.clear();
02776       delete _cellParameterCollection;
02777       _cellParameterCollection=0;
02778     }
02779     
02780     UInt_t n_cells=_mapping.getMaxCellsPerFrontEnd();
02781 
02782     if (n_cells!= _moduleBuffer.size()) {
02783       _moduleBuffer.resize(n_cells);
02784     }
02785 
02786 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
02787     // Histograms are created per module. Thus, the histogram arrays should be 
02788     // recreated if the number of modules changes.
02789     if(_mapping.isModuleConditionsDataComplete()) {
02790       createHistograms(_mapping.getNModules());
02791     }
02792 #endif
02793   }
02794 
02795   void SimpleHitSearch::moduleLocationChanged(lcio::LCCollection* col) {
02796     VRawADCValueProcessor::moduleLocationChanged(col);
02797 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
02798     // Histograms are created per module. Thus, the histogram arrays should be 
02799     // recreated if the number of modules changes.
02800     if(_mapping.isModuleConditionsDataComplete()) {
02801       createHistograms(_mapping.getNModules());
02802     }
02803 #endif
02804 
02805     UInt_t n_cells=_mapping.getMaxCellsPerFrontEnd();
02806 
02807     if (n_cells!= _moduleBuffer.size()) {
02808       _moduleBuffer.resize(n_cells);
02809     }
02810 
02811     // maybe the number of modules changed
02812     if (_cellParameter.size()>0) {
02813       _cellParameter.clear();
02814       delete _cellParameterCollection;
02815       _cellParameterCollection=0;
02816     }
02817 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
02818     // Histograms are created per module. Thus, the histogram arrays should be 
02819     // recreated if the number of modules changes.
02820     if(_mapping.isModuleConditionsDataComplete()) {
02821       createHistograms(_mapping.getNModules());
02822     }
02823 #endif
02824   }
02825 
02826 
02827   //#define DEBUG_RECO
02828   Float_t SimpleHitSearch::calculatePedestalCorrection(UInt_t module_i, Float_t *adc_values_per_module) const {
02829 
02830 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
02831     // paranoia checks
02832     assert( module_i < _mapping.getNModules() );
02833     assert( module_i < _avNoisePerModule.size() );
02834 #endif
02835 
02836 
02837 #ifdef DEBUG_RECO    
02838     bool verbose=(_lastEvent>8710 &&module_i==2);
02839 #endif
02840     // histmgr::HistMgr *histogramList=histmgr::HistMgr::getInstance();
02841 
02842       //#ifdef DEBUG_RECO    
02843       //    for (UInt_t redo=0; redo<2; redo++) {
02844       //      bool verbose=(redo>0 || module_i==1);
02845       //#endif
02846     Float_t noise=_avNoisePerModule[module_i];
02847     UInt_t n_cells=_mapping.getNCellsPerModule(module_i);
02848 
02849     AverageSimple_t pedestal;
02850     UInt_t cell_i=0;
02851 
02852     //start with the first "valid" cell: cell_i.
02853     while (adc_values_per_module[cell_i]>=FLT_MAX && cell_i<n_cells) cell_i++;
02854     if (cell_i>=n_cells) return FLT_MAX;
02855 
02856     // Initialisation done in next loop over chips
02857     //    Float_t min_val[3]={adc_values_per_module[cell_i],adc_values_per_module[cell_i],adc_values_per_module[cell_i]};
02858     
02859     bool ignore_chip[12];
02860     Float_t min_val_chip[12];
02861     Float_t max_val_chip[12];
02862     Float_t min_val[12];
02863     for (UInt_t i=0; i<12; i++) {
02864       ignore_chip[i]=false;
02865     //CRP To prevent from accessing the min_val array beyond its boundaries    
02866       min_val[i]= adc_values_per_module[cell_i];
02867       min_val_chip[i]=FLT_MAX;
02868       max_val_chip[i]=-FLT_MAX;
02869     }
02870 
02871     UInt_t n_chips=(n_cells == 216 ? 12 : 6 );
02872 
02873     //fill an array "pedestal" with the values from all the valid cell of the PCB
02874     //find min and max values per chip
02875     //CAMM why discarding the first cell ????
02876     //CAMM for (UInt_t pad_i=1; pad_i<n_cells; pad_i++) {
02877     for (UInt_t pad_i=cell_i; pad_i<n_cells; pad_i++) {
02878       Float_t adc_val=adc_values_per_module[pad_i];
02879       if (adc_val<FLT_MAX) {
02880         pedestal.add(adc_val);
02881         UInt_t chip_i=pad_i%n_chips;
02882         if (adc_val < min_val_chip[chip_i]) min_val_chip[chip_i]=adc_val;
02883         if (adc_val > max_val_chip[chip_i]) max_val_chip[chip_i]=adc_val;
02884       }
02885     }
02886 
02887     Float_t mean_min_val=0;
02888     UInt_t n_min_vals=0;
02889     
02890 #ifdef DEBUG_RECO
02891     if (verbose && module_i == 2) {
02892       std::cout << " module = " << std::setw(3) << module_i << " Chip ADC range " << std::endl;
02893     }
02894 #endif
02895 
02896     //loop on chips to fill the mean value of the minimum value per chip, discarding whole wafer if one of the chips has a signal hit (defined as max-min > 3000).
02897     for (UInt_t chip_i=0; chip_i<n_chips; chip_i++) {//loop on chips
02898 #ifdef DEBUG_RECO
02899       if (verbose && module_i == 2) {
02900         std::cout << std::setw(2) << chip_i << " : " << std::setw(12) << min_val_chip[chip_i]  << " -  " << std::setw(12) << max_val_chip[chip_i] 
02901                   << " : ";
02902         for (UInt_t pad_i=chip_i; pad_i<n_cells; pad_i+=n_chips) {
02903           if (static_cast<int>(adc_values_per_module[pad_i])>=1000) {
02904             std::cout << std::setw(4) << "+++";
02905           }
02906           else if (static_cast<int>(adc_values_per_module[pad_i])<=-1000) {
02907             std::cout << std::setw(4) << "---";
02908           }
02909           else {
02910             std::cout << std::setw(4) << static_cast<int>(adc_values_per_module[pad_i]);
02911           }
02912         }
02913         std::cout << std::endl;
02914       
02915             }
02916 #endif
02917       //do per wafer : 2chips by 2 chips, so only even chip number.
02918       if ((chip_i%2)!=0)  continue;
02919 
02920       if (max_val_chip[chip_i] - min_val_chip[chip_i] > 3000 || max_val_chip[chip_i+1] - min_val_chip[chip_i+1] > 3000 ) {
02921         // ignore the whole wafer
02922         ignore_chip[chip_i  ]=true;
02923         ignore_chip[chip_i+1]=true;
02924       }
02925       else {
02926         //CAMM : why not calculating the mean also with chip+1 ????
02927         mean_min_val+=min_val[chip_i];
02928         n_min_vals++;
02929       }
02930     }//loop on chips
02931 
02932     if (n_min_vals<=1) return FLT_MAX;
02933     mean_min_val/=n_min_vals;
02934 
02935 #ifdef DEBUG_RECO
02936     if (verbose) {
02937       std::cout << "pedestal = " << pedestal << "  -- Min val: <" << std::setw(12) << mean_min_val << ">"; 
02938       for (UInt_t i=0; i<3;i++) {
02939         std::cout << std::setw(12) << min_val[i];
02940       }
02941       std::cout << std::endl;
02942     }
02943 #endif
02944 
02945     Float_t mean=mean_min_val + noise * 5;
02946     pedestal.calculate();
02947     if (mean>pedestal.mean()) {
02948       mean=pedestal.mean();
02949     }
02950     Float_t rms=10*noise;
02951     Float_t cut=10;
02952 
02953     for(UInt_t pass=0;;pass++) {
02954       //    if (pass>10) verbose=true;
02955       if (pass>20) break;
02956       pedestal=AverageSimple_t();
02957 #ifdef DEBUG_RECO
02958       if (verbose) {
02959         std::cout << " pass = " << pass << "  pedestal = " << mean << " cut = " << cut << " * " << noise << std::endl;
02960       }
02961 #endif
02962       //      dynamic_cast<histmgr::FloatHistogram1D*>(_histCol[kH1ModuleEventNoise]->getElementAt(module_i))->reset();
02963       for (UInt_t pad_i=0; pad_i<n_cells; pad_i++) {
02964         UInt_t chip_i=pad_i%n_chips;
02965         if (ignore_chip[chip_i]) continue;
02966  
02967         Float_t adc_val=adc_values_per_module[pad_i];
02968         if ( adc_val - mean < cut * noise) {
02969           pedestal.add(adc_val);
02970           //      dynamic_cast<histmgr::FloatHistogram1D*>(_histCol[kH1ModuleEventNoise]->getElementAt(module_i))->fill(adc_val-mean);
02971 
02972 #ifdef DEBUG_RECO
02973           if (verbose) {
02974             std::cout << std::setw(2) << pass << " :: " << std::setw(3) << pad_i << " :  " << std::setw(14) << adc_val << std::endl;
02975           }
02976 #endif
02977         }
02978 #ifdef DEBUG_RECO
02979         else if (verbose) {
02980           std::cout << std::setw(2) << pass << " :: " << std::setw(3) << pad_i << " : ( " << std::setw(14) << adc_val << ")" << std::endl;
02981         }
02982 #endif
02983       }
02984       pedestal.calculate();
02985 
02986 #ifdef DEBUG_RECO
02987       if (verbose) {
02988         std::cout << std::setw(2) << pass << " :: pedestal=" << std::setw(14) << pedestal << std::endl;
02989       }
02990 #endif
02991       
02992       Average_t test;
02993       UInt_t n=0;
02994       for (UInt_t pad_i=0; pad_i<n_cells; pad_i++) {
02995         UInt_t chip_i=pad_i%n_chips;
02996         if (ignore_chip[chip_i]) continue;
02997 
02998         Float_t adc_val=adc_values_per_module[pad_i];
02999         if ( adc_val-pedestal.mean() < 0) {
03000           test.add(adc_val-pedestal.mean());
03001           test.add(-(adc_val-pedestal.mean()));
03002 #ifdef DEBUG_RECO
03003           if (verbose) {
03004             std::cout << std::setw(2) << pass << " :: " << std::setw(3) << pad_i << " : ( " << std::setw(14) << adc_val << ")" << std::endl;
03005           }
03006 #endif
03007           n+=2;
03008         }
03009       }
03010       test.calculate();
03011 #ifdef DEBUG_RECO
03012       if (verbose) {
03013         std::cout << pass << " :: test = " << test << std::endl;
03014       }
03015 #endif
03016 
03017       Float_t old_mean=mean;
03018       if (n<4) {
03019         if (pedestal.n()<4) {
03020           mean += cut * noise;
03021         }
03022         else {
03023           mean-=(pedestal.mean()-mean)*.2;
03024           if (fabs(old_mean-mean)<noise*.05) break;
03025         }
03026 #ifdef DEBUG_RECO
03027         if (verbose) {
03028           cout << "n<4: mean=" << old_mean << " -> " << pedestal.mean() << " -> " << mean << " (" << n << ")" << "  noise= " << noise << endl;
03029         }
03030 #endif
03031         continue;
03032       }
03033       if (test.sigma() < noise) {
03034 #ifdef DEBUG_RECO
03035         if (verbose) {
03036           cout << "test.sigma() < noise :: mean=" << old_mean << " -> " << pedestal.mean() 
03037                << " diff = " << pedestal.mean() - old_mean << " (~<? " << noise/sqrt(static_cast<Float_t>(pedestal.n())) << ") "
03038                << "; rms=" << test.sigma() << " (" << n << ")" << "cut=" << cut << "  noise= " << noise << endl;
03039         }
03040 #endif
03041         break;
03042       }
03043       mean=pedestal.mean()-sqrt((sqr(test.sigma())-sqr(noise))/n);
03044 #ifdef DEBUG_RECO
03045       if (verbose) {
03046         cout << "mean=" << old_mean << " -> " << pedestal.mean() << " -> " << mean  << "; rms=" << test.sigma() << " (" << n << ")"  << "  noise= " << noise << endl;
03047       }
03048 #endif
03049 
03050       if (fabs(test.sigma()-rms)<.05) {
03051         if ( test.sigma() < noise * 1.2) break;
03052         mean -= test.sigma() * .5;
03053       }
03054 
03055       if (pass>2 && fabs(old_mean-mean)<3*noise/sqrt(static_cast<Float_t>(pedestal.n()))) break;
03056 
03057 
03058       rms=test.sigma();
03059       if (cut/2 >= 3) {
03060         cut /=2;
03061       }
03062     }
03063     
03064 #ifdef DEBUG_RECO
03065     //    if (fabs(pedestal.mean())<500) {
03066     if (verbose) {
03067       std::cout << " correction = " << pedestal.mean() << std::endl;
03068     }
03069 #endif
03070 
03071     return pedestal.mean();
03072     //#ifdef DEBUG_RECO
03073     //    }
03074     //    
03075     //}
03076     //    return 0;
03077     //#endif
03078   }
03079 
03080 
03081  // simple iteration
03082 #ifdef CORRECT_SIGNAL_INDUCED_PED_SHIFT
03083   vector<Float_t> SimpleHitSearch::calculateSignalInducedPedestalCorrection(UInt_t module_i, const Float_t *adc_values_per_module) const {
03084 
03085 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
03086     // paranoia checks
03087     assert( module_i < _mapping.getNModules() );
03088     assert( module_i < _avNoisePerModule.size() );
03089 #endif
03090     //Float_t noise=_avNoisePerModule[module_i];
03091     UInt_t n_cells=_mapping.getNCellsPerModule(module_i);
03092 
03093         
03094     UInt_t cell_i=0;
03095     while (adc_values_per_module[cell_i]>=FLT_MAX && cell_i<n_cells) cell_i++;
03096     //if (cell_i>=n_cells) return NULL;
03097 
03098         
03099     UInt_t n_chips=(n_cells== 216 ? 12 : 6 );
03100     vector<Float_t> shift_per_wafer;
03101     shift_per_wafer.resize(n_chips/2,0);
03102     
03103     
03104     vector<Float_t> min_val_wafer;
03105     min_val_wafer.resize(n_chips/2,FLT_MAX);
03106     vector<Float_t> max_val_wafer;
03107     max_val_wafer.resize(n_chips/2,-FLT_MAX);
03108     //vector<Float_t> min_val;
03109     //min_val.resize(n_chips/2,adc_values_per_module[cell_i]);
03110         
03111 
03112     for (UInt_t pad_i=0; pad_i<n_cells; pad_i++) {
03113       Float_t adc_val=adc_values_per_module[pad_i];
03114       if (adc_val<FLT_MAX) {
03115         UInt_t chip_i=pad_i%n_chips;
03116         UInt_t wafer_i=chip_i/2;
03117         if (adc_val < min_val_wafer[wafer_i]) min_val_wafer[wafer_i]=adc_val;
03118         if (adc_val > max_val_wafer[wafer_i]) max_val_wafer[wafer_i]=adc_val;
03119       }
03120     }
03121 
03122     //DEBUG
03123     //cout << "Still " << n_chips/2 << " wafers" << endl;
03124 
03125 
03126     for (UInt_t chip_i=0; chip_i<n_chips; chip_i++) {
03127       
03128       if ((chip_i%2)!=0)  continue; // process whole wafer at once
03129 
03130       //DEBUG
03131       Float_t total_signal_on_wafer=0;
03132       
03133 
03134       //AverageSimple_t pedestal_of_wafer;
03135       UInt_t wafer_i=chip_i/2;
03136       if (max_val_wafer[wafer_i] - min_val_wafer[wafer_i] > 200 ) { //assume that wafer has been hit
03137         
03138         //DEBUG
03139         //cout << "wafer "<< wafer_i << " is hit" << endl;
03140         //cout << "vector holds " << shift_per_wafer.size() << endl;
03141 
03142 
03143         // get mean noise of wafer
03144         Float_t mean_noise_of_wafer=0;
03145         UInt_t living_cells_on_wafer=0;
03146         for(UInt_t cell_i=chip_i; cell_i< n_cells ; cell_i+=n_chips) {   // do it for this chip...
03147           Float_t adc_val=adc_values_per_module[cell_i];
03148           if (adc_val<FLT_MAX) {
03149             const CellParameter &cell_parameter=_cellParameter[module_i][cell_i]; 
03150             mean_noise_of_wafer+=cell_parameter.getNoise() ;
03151             living_cells_on_wafer++;
03152           }
03153            adc_val=adc_values_per_module[cell_i+1];
03154            if (adc_val<FLT_MAX) {
03155              const CellParameter &cell_parameter=_cellParameter[module_i][cell_i+1]; 
03156              mean_noise_of_wafer+=cell_parameter.getNoise();
03157              living_cells_on_wafer++;
03158            }
03159         }
03160         mean_noise_of_wafer = mean_noise_of_wafer/living_cells_on_wafer;
03161 
03162         // now try to get ped shift
03163         multimap<Float_t, UInt_t > ordered_adc_values;
03164         
03165         for(UInt_t cell_i=chip_i; cell_i< n_cells ; cell_i+=n_chips) {   // do it for this chip...
03166           Float_t adc_val=adc_values_per_module[cell_i];
03167           if (adc_val<FLT_MAX) {
03168             ordered_adc_values.insert(make_pair(adc_val,cell_i));
03169             total_signal_on_wafer+=adc_val;
03170           }
03171           adc_val=adc_values_per_module[cell_i+1];   // ...and for the next one to have the complete wafer
03172           if (adc_val<FLT_MAX) {
03173             ordered_adc_values.insert(make_pair(adc_val,cell_i+1));
03174             total_signal_on_wafer+=adc_val;
03175           }
03176         }
03177 
03178         multimap<Float_t, UInt_t >::iterator cell_it;
03179         multimap<Float_t, UInt_t >::reverse_iterator rv_cell_it;
03180 
03181 
03182         cell_it=ordered_adc_values.begin();
03183         Float_t starting_adc=0;
03184         if(ordered_adc_values.size()>2) {
03185           starting_adc+=cell_it->first;
03186           cell_it++;
03187           starting_adc+=cell_it->first;
03188           cell_it++;
03189           starting_adc+=cell_it->first;
03190         }
03191         
03192         starting_adc=starting_adc/3;
03193 
03194         Float_t ped_mean=0;
03195         Float_t n_samples=0;
03196         
03197 
03198         for(cell_it=ordered_adc_values.begin();cell_it!=ordered_adc_values.end(); cell_it++) {
03199           if(cell_it->first > starting_adc + 6*mean_noise_of_wafer)  //exclude cells that are most likely to be hit
03200             ordered_adc_values.erase(cell_it);
03201         }
03202 
03203 
03204         //if(ordered_adc_values.size()<10)
03205         //cout << "Size: " << ordered_adc_values.size() << endl;
03206         UInt_t pass=0;
03207         for(UInt_t pass_i=0; pass_i<35; pass_i++) {
03208           
03209           AverageSimple_t pedestal;
03210           //Float_t old_mean=ped_mean;
03211           for(cell_it=ordered_adc_values.begin();cell_it!=ordered_adc_values.end(); cell_it++) {
03212             //if(cell_it->first < starting_adc + 6*mean_noise_of_wafer)
03213             pedestal.add(cell_it->first);
03214               //if(ordered_adc_values.size()<5)
03215                 //cout << "Size after adding: " <<ordered_adc_values.size() << " pass: " << pass_i <<  endl;
03216                 //cout << cell_it->first <<  endl;
03217           }
03218           pedestal.calculate();
03219           //if( pedestal.n()<3)
03220             //cout << pedestal.n() << " after calculating " << " pass: " << pass_i <<  endl;
03221           
03222           
03223           if(pedestal.sigma() < 1.2*mean_noise_of_wafer) {
03224             ped_mean=pedestal.mean();
03225             n_samples=pedestal.n();
03226             //if(n_samples<3){
03227             //multimap<Float_t, UInt_t >::iterator cell_it2;
03228               //cout << n_samples << " , " << pedestal.mean() << endl;
03229               //for(cell_it2=ordered_adc_values.begin();cell_it2!=ordered_adc_values.end(); cell_it2++) {
03230             //cout << cell_it2->first << endl;
03231             //}
03232             //}
03233             break;
03234           }
03235           /*
03236           if(fabs(pedestal.mean() - old_mean) < 0.01*mean_noise_of_wafer) {
03237             ped_mean=pedestal.mean();
03238             n_samples=pedestal.n();
03239             //cout << "shift doesnt move any more" << endl;
03240             if(n_samples<3){
03241               multimap<Float_t, UInt_t >::iterator cell_it2;
03242               cout << n_samples << " , " << pedestal.mean() << endl;
03243               for(cell_it2=ordered_adc_values.begin();cell_it2!=ordered_adc_values.end(); cell_it2++) {
03244               cout << cell_it2->first << endl;
03245               }
03246             }
03247             break;
03248             
03249           }
03250           */
03251           rv_cell_it = ordered_adc_values.rbegin();
03252           //cout << "Size before removing: " << ordered_adc_values.size() << " pass: " << pass_i <<  endl;
03253           if(ordered_adc_values.size()>3)
03254             {
03255               cell_it=ordered_adc_values.begin();
03256               if(fabs((cell_it->first - starting_adc)) > fabs((rv_cell_it->first -starting_adc)) ) {
03257                 ordered_adc_values.erase(cell_it);
03258                 //if(pedestal.n()<5)
03259                 //cout << "removing first one" << endl;
03260               }
03261               else {
03262                 for(cell_it=ordered_adc_values.begin();cell_it!=ordered_adc_values.end();cell_it++) {
03263                   if((*cell_it)==(*rv_cell_it)){
03264                     ordered_adc_values.erase(cell_it);
03265                     //if(pedestal.n()<5)
03266                     //cout << "removing last one" << endl;
03267                       break;
03268 
03269                   }
03270 
03271                 }
03272               }
03273               
03274             }
03275           ped_mean=pedestal.mean();
03276           n_samples=pedestal.n();
03277           pass=pass_i;
03278           if(pass_i==34) {
03279             //cout << "Pass 34!" << endl;
03280             if(n_samples==2) {
03281 
03282               // critere for mean
03283               AverageSimple_t two_cells;
03284               multimap<Float_t, UInt_t >::iterator cell_it2;
03285               for(cell_it2=ordered_adc_values.begin();cell_it2!=ordered_adc_values.end(); cell_it2++) {
03286                 two_cells.add(cell_it2->first);
03287               }
03288               two_cells.calculate();
03289               if(two_cells.sigma()<3*mean_noise_of_wafer) {
03290                 ped_mean=two_cells.mean();
03291                 break;
03292               }
03293               else {
03294                 ped_mean=ordered_adc_values.begin()->first;
03295                 n_samples=1;
03296                 break;
03297               }
03298             }
03299             else {
03300               if(n_samples==3) {
03301                 //cout << n_samples << endl;
03302                 AverageSimple_t two_cells;
03303                 multimap<Float_t, UInt_t >::iterator cell_it2;
03304                 cell_it2=ordered_adc_values.begin();
03305                 two_cells.add(cell_it2->first);
03306                 cell_it2++;
03307                 two_cells.add(cell_it2->first);
03308                 two_cells.calculate();
03309                 AverageSimple_t three_cells;
03310                 for(cell_it2=ordered_adc_values.begin();cell_it2!=ordered_adc_values.end(); cell_it2++) {
03311                   three_cells.add(cell_it2->first);
03312                 }
03313                 three_cells.calculate();
03314                 if(fabs(two_cells.sigma()-mean_noise_of_wafer) < fabs(three_cells.sigma()-mean_noise_of_wafer)) {
03315                   ped_mean=two_cells.mean();
03316                   break;
03317                 }
03318                 else {
03319                   ped_mean=three_cells.mean();
03320                   break;
03321                 }
03322               }
03323               else {
03324                 //cout << n_samples << endl;
03325                 ped_mean=0;
03326                 multimap<Float_t, UInt_t >::iterator cell_it2;
03327                 for(cell_it2=ordered_adc_values.begin();cell_it2!=ordered_adc_values.end(); cell_it2++) {
03328                   ped_mean+=cell_it2->first;
03329                   //cout << cell_it2->first << endl;
03330                 }
03331                 ped_mean=ped_mean/ordered_adc_values.size();
03332                 //cout << ped_mean << endl;
03333                 break;
03334               }
03335             }
03336           }
03337         }
03338         //if(n_samples<10)
03339         //cout << n_samples << " pass: " << pass << endl;
03340           
03341         if( ped_mean > 0 || -(ped_mean) < mean_noise_of_wafer)    // sample not big enough to be meaningful, only negative and significant shift
03342           ped_mean=0;
03343 
03344 
03345         //if(n_samples < 2 )//|| ped_mean() > 0 || -(ped_mean()) < mean_noise_of_wafer)    // sample not big enough to be meaningful, only negative and significant shift
03346         //  {
03347             //cout << "no shift, mean is " << pedestal_of_wafer.mean() << endl;
03348         //  continue;
03349         // }
03350         //DEBUG
03351         //cout << "shift of " << pedestal_of_wafer.mean() << endl;
03352         /*
03353         if(pedestal.mean() > 80)
03354           {
03355             cout << "Big shift: " << pedestal.mean() << "for wafer " << wafer_i << "on "<< module_i  << ", total Signal: " << total_signal_on_wafer << endl;
03356             cout << "calculated with: "<< pedestal.n()   << " pads " << endl;
03357             for(UInt_t cell_i=chip_i; cell_i< n_cells ; cell_i+=n_chips) {   
03358               cout << adc_values_per_module[cell_i] << endl;
03359               cout << adc_values_per_module[cell_i+1] << endl;
03360             }
03361           }
03362         */
03363         /*
03364         if(total_signal_on_wafer<5000 && ped_mean <-70)
03365           {
03366             cout << ped_mean << " signal with low shift calculated with: "<< n_samples << " pads " << endl;
03367             for(UInt_t cell_i=chip_i; cell_i< n_cells ; cell_i+=n_chips) {   
03368               cout << adc_values_per_module[cell_i] << endl;
03369               cout << adc_values_per_module[cell_i+1] << endl;
03370             }
03371 
03372           }
03373         */
03374         /*
03375         if(ped_mean < -10 &&ped_mean > -20  && wafer_i==4 && module_i == 10 && total_signal_on_wafer>14000)
03376           {
03377             cout << "Big shift: " << ped_mean << " for wafer " << wafer_i << " on "<< module_i  << ", total Signal: " << total_signal_on_wafer << endl;
03378             cout << "calculated with: "<< n_samples      << " pads " << endl;
03379             for(UInt_t cell_i=chip_i; cell_i< n_cells ; cell_i+=n_chips) {   
03380               cout << adc_values_per_module[cell_i] << endl;
03381               cout << adc_values_per_module[cell_i+1] << endl;
03382             }
03383           }
03384         */
03385           
03386         shift_per_wafer[wafer_i]=ped_mean;
03387 
03388       }
03389     }
03390     
03391     return shift_per_wafer;
03392 
03393   }
